00712   var $strip_htmltags = array('base', 'blink', 'body', 'doctype', 'embed', 'font', 'form', 'frame', 'frameset', 'html', 'iframe', 'input', 'marquee', 'meta', 'noscript', 'object', 'param', 'script', 'style');
00713 
00735   function SimplePie($feed_url = null, $cache_location = null, $cache_duration = null)
00736   {
00737     // Other objects, instances created here so we can set options on them
00738     $this->sanitize = new SimplePie_Sanitize;
00739 
00740     // Set options if they're passed to the constructor
00741     if ($cache_location !== null)
00742     {
00743       $this->set_cache_location($cache_location);
00744     }
00745 
00746     if ($cache_duration !== null)
00747     {
00748       $this->set_cache_duration($cache_duration);
00749     }
00750 
00751     // Only init the script if we're passed a feed URL
00752     if ($feed_url !== null)
00753     {
00754       $this->set_feed_url($feed_url);
00755       $this->init();
00756     }
00757   }
00758 
00762   function __toString()
00763   {
00764     return md5(serialize($this->data));
00765   }
00766 
00770   function __destruct()
00771   {
00772     if ((version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.3', '<') || !gc_enabled()) && !ini_get('zend.ze1_compatibility_mode'))
00773     {
00774       if (!empty($this->data['items']))
00775       {
00776         foreach ($this->data['items'] as $item)
00777         {
00778           $item->__destruct();
00779         }
00780         unset($item, $this->data['items']);
00781       }
00782       if (!empty($this->data['ordered_items']))
00783       {
00784         foreach ($this->data['ordered_items'] as $item)
00785         {
00786           $item->__destruct();
00787         }
00788         unset($item, $this->data['ordered_items']);
00789       }
00790     }
00791   }
00792 
00801   function force_feed($enable = false)
00802   {
00803     $this->force_feed = (bool) $enable;
00804   }
00805 
00822   function set_feed_url($url)
00823   {
00824     if (is_array($url))
00825     {
00826       $this->multifeed_url = array();
00827       foreach ($url as $value)
00828       {
00829         $this->multifeed_url[] = SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($value, 1);
00830       }
00831     }
00832     else
00833     {
00834       $this->feed_url = SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($url, 1);
00835     }
00836   }
00837 
00845   function set_file(&$file)
00846   {
00847     if (is_a($file, 'SimplePie_File'))
00848     {
00849       $this->feed_url = $file->url;
00850       $this->file =& $file;
00851       return true;
00852     }
00853     return false;
00854   }
00855

01028   function set_cache_class($class = 'SimplePie_Cache')
01029   {
01030     if (SimplePie_Misc::is_subclass_of($class, 'SimplePie_Cache'))
01031     {
01032       $this->cache_class = $class;
01033       return true;
01034     }
01035     return false;
01036   }

01340   function set_cache_name_function($function = 'md5')
01341   {
01342     if (is_callable($function))
01343     {
01344       $this->cache_name_function = $function;
01345     }
01346   }

01354   function set_javascript($get = 'js')
01355   {
01356     if ($get)
01357     {
01358       $this->javascript = (string) $get;
01359     }
01360     else
01361     {
01362       $this->javascript = false;
01363     }
01364   }
01365 
01373   function set_stupidly_fast($set = false)
01374   {
01375     if ($set)
01376     {
01377       $this->enable_order_by_date(false);
01378       $this->remove_div(false);
01379       $this->strip_comments(false);
01380       $this->strip_htmltags(false);
01381       $this->strip_attributes(false);
01382       $this->set_image_handler(false);
01383     }
01384   }
01385 
01392   function set_max_checked_feeds($max = 10)
01393   {
01394     $this->max_checked_feeds = (int) $max;
01395   }
01396 
01397   function remove_div($enable = true)
01398   {
01399     $this->sanitize->remove_div($enable);
01400   }
01401 
01402   function strip_htmltags($tags = '', $encode = null)
01403   {
01404     if ($tags === '')
01405     {
01406       $tags = $this->strip_htmltags;
01407     }
01408     $this->sanitize->strip_htmltags($tags);
01409     if ($encode !== null)
01410     {
01411       $this->sanitize->encode_instead_of_strip($tags);
01412     }
01413   }
01414 
01415   function encode_instead_of_strip($enable = true)
01416   {
01417     $this->sanitize->encode_instead_of_strip($enable);
01418   }
01419 
01420   function strip_attributes($attribs = '')
01421   {
01422     if ($attribs === '')
01423     {
01424       $attribs = $this->strip_attributes;
01425     }
01426     $this->sanitize->strip_attributes($attribs);
01427   }
01428 
01429   function set_output_encoding($encoding = 'UTF-8')
01430   {
01431     $this->sanitize->set_output_encoding($encoding);
01432   }
01433 
01434   function strip_comments($strip = false)
01435   {
01436     $this->sanitize->strip_comments($strip);
01437   }

01447   function set_url_replacements($element_attribute = array('a' => 'href', 'area' => 'href', 'blockquote' => 'cite', 'del' => 'cite', 'form' => 'action', 'img' => array('longdesc', 'src'), 'input' => 'src', 'ins' => 'cite', 'q' => 'cite'))
01448   {
01449     $this->sanitize->set_url_replacements($element_attribute);
01450   }
01451 
01459   function set_favicon_handler($page = false, $qs = 'i')
01460   {
01461     if ($page !== false)
01462     {
01463       $this->favicon_handler = $page . '?' . $qs . '=';
01464     }
01465     else
01466     {
01467       $this->favicon_handler = '';
01468     }
01469   }
01470 
01478   function set_image_handler($page = false, $qs = 'i')
01479   {
01480     if ($page !== false)
01481     {
01482       $this->sanitize->set_image_handler($page . '?' . $qs . '=');
01483     }
01484     else
01485     {
01486       $this->image_handler = '';
01487     }
01488   }
01489 
01496   function set_item_limit($limit = 0)
01497   {
01498     $this->item_limit = (int) $limit;
01499   }
01500 
01501   function init()
01502   {
01503     // Check absolute bare minimum requirements.
01504     if ((function_exists('version_compare') && version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '4.3.0', '<')) || !extension_loaded('xml') || !extension_loaded('pcre'))
01505     {
01506       return false;
01507     }
01508     // Then check the xml extension is sane (i.e., libxml 2.7.x issue on PHP < 5.2.9 and libxml 2.7.0 to 2.7.2 on any version) if we don't have xmlreader.
01509     elseif (!extension_loaded('xmlreader'))
01510     {
01511       static $xml_is_sane = null;
01512       if ($xml_is_sane === null)
01513       {
01514         $parser_check = xml_parser_create();
01515         xml_parse_into_struct($parser_check, '<foo>&amp;</foo>', $values);
01516         xml_parser_free($parser_check);
01517         $xml_is_sane = isset($values[0]['value']);
01518       }
01519       if (!$xml_is_sane)
01520       {
01521         return false;
01522       }
01523     }
01524 
01525     if (isset($_GET[$this->javascript]))
01526     {
01527       SimplePie_Misc::output_javascript();
01528       exit;
01529     }
01530 
01531     // Pass whatever was set with config options over to the sanitizer.
01532     $this->sanitize->pass_cache_data($this->cache, $this->cache_location, $this->cache_name_function, $this->cache_class);
01533     $this->sanitize->pass_file_data($this->file_class, $this->timeout, $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen);
01534 
01535     if ($this->feed_url !== null || $this->raw_data !== null)
01536     {
01537       $this->data = array();
01538       $this->multifeed_objects = array();
01539       $cache = false;
01540 
01541       if ($this->feed_url !== null)
01542       {
01543         $parsed_feed_url = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($this->feed_url);
01544         // Decide whether to enable caching
01545         if ($this->cache && $parsed_feed_url['scheme'] !== '')
01546         {
01547           $cache = call_user_func(array($this->cache_class, 'create'), $this->cache_location, call_user_func($this->cache_name_function, $this->feed_url), 'spc');
01548         }
01549         // If it's enabled and we don't want an XML dump, use the cache
01550         if ($cache && !$this->xml_dump)
01551         {
01552           // Load the Cache
01553           $this->data = $cache->load();
01554           if (!empty($this->data))
01555           {
01556             // If the cache is for an outdated build of SimplePie
01557             if (!isset($this->data['build']) || $this->data['build'] !== SIMPLEPIE_BUILD)
01558             {
01559               $cache->unlink();
01560               $this->data = array();
01561             }
01562             // If we've hit a collision just rerun it with caching disabled
01563             elseif (isset($this->data['url']) && $this->data['url'] !== $this->feed_url)
01564             {
01565               $cache = false;
01566               $this->data = array();
01567             }
01568             // If we've got a non feed_url stored (if the page isn't actually a feed, or is a redirect) use that URL.
01569             elseif (isset($this->data['feed_url']))
01570             {
01571               // If the autodiscovery cache is still valid use it.
01572               if ($cache->mtime() + $this->autodiscovery_cache_duration > time())
01573               {
01574                 // Do not need to do feed autodiscovery yet.
01575                 if ($this->data['feed_url'] === $this->data['url'])
01576                 {
01577                   $cache->unlink();
01578                   $this->data = array();
01579                 }
01580                 else
01581                 {
01582                   $this->set_feed_url($this->data['feed_url']);
01583                   return $this->init();
01584                 }
01585               }
01586             }
01587             // Check if the cache has been updated
01588             elseif ($cache->mtime() + $this->cache_duration < time())
01589             {
01590               // If we have last-modified and/or etag set
01591               if (isset($this->data['headers']['last-modified']) || isset($this->data['headers']['etag']))
01592               {
01593                 $headers = array();
01594                 if (isset($this->data['headers']['last-modified']))
01595                 {
01596                   $headers['if-modified-since'] = $this->data['headers']['last-modified'];
01597                 }
01598                 if (isset($this->data['headers']['etag']))
01599                 {
01600                   $headers['if-none-match'] = '"' . $this->data['headers']['etag'] . '"';
01601                 }
01602                 $file = new $this->file_class($this->feed_url, $this->timeout/10, 5, $headers, $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen);
01603                 if ($file->success)
01604                 {
01605                   if ($file->status_code === 304)
01606                   {
01607                     $cache->touch();
01608                     return true;
01609                   }
01610                   else
01611                   {
01612                     $headers = $file->headers;
01613                   }
01614                 }
01615                 else
01616                 {
01617                   unset($file);
01618                 }
01619               }
01620             }
01621             // If the cache is still valid, just return true
01622             else
01623             {
01624               return true;
01625             }
01626           }
01627           // If the cache is empty, delete it
01628           else
01629           {
01630             $cache->unlink();
01631             $this->data = array();
01632           }
01633         }
01634         // If we don't already have the file (it'll only exist if we've opened it to check if the cache has been modified), open it.
01635         if (!isset($file))
01636         {
01637           if (is_a($this->file, 'SimplePie_File') && $this->file->url === $this->feed_url)
01638           {
01639             $file =& $this->file;
01640           }
01641           else
01642           {
01643             $file = new $this->file_class($this->feed_url, $this->timeout, 5, null, $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen);
01644           }
01645         }
01646         // If the file connection has an error, set SimplePie::error to that and quit
01647         if (!$file->success && !($file->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE === 0 || ($file->status_code === 200 || $file->status_code > 206 && $file->status_code < 300)))
01648         {
01649           $this->error = $file->error;
01650           if (!empty($this->data))
01651           {
01652             return true;
01653           }
01654           else
01655           {
01656             return false;
01657           }
01658         }
01659 
01660         if (!$this->force_feed)
01661         {
01662           // Check if the supplied URL is a feed, if it isn't, look for it.
01663           $locate = new $this->locator_class($file, $this->timeout, $this->useragent, $this->file_class, $this->max_checked_feeds, $this->content_type_sniffer_class);
01664           if (!$locate->is_feed($file))
01665           {
01666             // We need to unset this so that if SimplePie::set_file() has been called that object is untouched
01667             unset($file);
01668             if ($file = $locate->find($this->autodiscovery, $this->all_discovered_feeds))
01669             {
01670               if ($cache)
01671               {
01672                 $this->data = array('url' => $this->feed_url, 'feed_url' => $file->url, 'build' => SIMPLEPIE_BUILD);
01673                 if (!$cache->save($this))
01674                 {
01675                   trigger_error("$this->cache_location is not writeable. Make sure you've set the correct relative or absolute path, and that the location is server-writable.", E_USER_WARNING);
01676                 }
01677                 $cache = call_user_func(array($this->cache_class, 'create'), $this->cache_location, call_user_func($this->cache_name_function, $file->url), 'spc');
01678               }
01679               $this->feed_url = $file->url;
01680             }
01681             else
01682             {
01683               $this->error = "A feed could not be found at $this->feed_url. A feed with an invalid mime type may fall victim to this error, or " . SIMPLEPIE_NAME . " was unable to auto-discover it.. Use force_feed() if you are certain this URL is a real feed.";
01684               SimplePie_Misc::error($this->error, E_USER_NOTICE, __FILE__, __LINE__);
01685               return false;
01686             }
01687           }
01688           $locate = null;
01689         }
01690 
01691         $headers = $file->headers;
01692         $data = $file->body;
01693         $sniffer = new $this->content_type_sniffer_class($file);
01694         $sniffed = $sniffer->get_type();
01695       }
01696       else
01697       {
01698         $data = $this->raw_data;
01699       }
01700 
01701       // Set up array of possible encodings
01702       $encodings = array();
01703 
01704       // First check to see if input has been overridden.
01705       if ($this->input_encoding !== false)
01706       {
01707         $encodings[] = $this->input_encoding;
01708       }
01709 
01710       $application_types = array('application/xml', 'application/xml-dtd', 'application/xml-external-parsed-entity');
01711       $text_types = array('text/xml', 'text/xml-external-parsed-entity');
01712 
01713       // RFC 3023 (only applies to sniffed content)
01714       if (isset($sniffed))
01715       {
01716         if (in_array($sniffed, $application_types) || substr($sniffed, 0, 12) === 'application/' && substr($sniffed, -4) === '+xml')
01717         {
01718           if (isset($headers['content-type']) && preg_match('/;\x20?charset=([^;]*)/i', $headers['content-type'], $charset))
01719           {
01720             $encodings[] = strtoupper($charset[1]);
01721           }
01722           $encodings = array_merge($encodings, SimplePie_Misc::xml_encoding($data));
01723           $encodings[] = 'UTF-8';
01724         }
01725         elseif (in_array($sniffed, $text_types) || substr($sniffed, 0, 5) === 'text/' && substr($sniffed, -4) === '+xml')
01726         {
01727           if (isset($headers['content-type']) && preg_match('/;\x20?charset=([^;]*)/i', $headers['content-type'], $charset))
01728           {
01729             $encodings[] = $charset[1];
01730           }
01731           $encodings[] = 'US-ASCII';
01732         }
01733         // Text MIME-type default
01734         elseif (substr($sniffed, 0, 5) === 'text/')
01735         {
01736           $encodings[] = 'US-ASCII';
01737         }
01738       }
01739 
01740       // Fallback to XML 1.0 Appendix F.1/UTF-8/ISO-8859-1
01741       $encodings = array_merge($encodings, SimplePie_Misc::xml_encoding($data));
01742       $encodings[] = 'UTF-8';
01743       $encodings[] = 'ISO-8859-1';
01744 
01745       // There's no point in trying an encoding twice
01746       $encodings = array_unique($encodings);
01747 
01748       // If we want the XML, just output that with the most likely encoding and quit
01749       if ($this->xml_dump)
01750       {
01751         header('Content-type: text/xml; charset=' . $encodings[0]);
01752         echo $data;
01753         exit;
01754       }
01755 
01756       // Loop through each possible encoding, till we return something, or run out of possibilities
01757       foreach ($encodings as $encoding)
01758       {
01759         // Change the encoding to UTF-8 (as we always use UTF-8 internally)
01760         if ($utf8_data = SimplePie_Misc::change_encoding($data, $encoding, 'UTF-8'))
01761         {
01762           // Create new parser
01763           $parser = new $this->parser_class();
01764 
01765           // If it's parsed fine
01766           if ($parser->parse($utf8_data, 'UTF-8'))
01767           {
01768             $this->data = $parser->get_data();
01769             if ($this->get_type() & ~SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_NONE)
01770             {
01771               if (isset($headers))
01772               {
01773                 $this->data['headers'] = $headers;
01774               }
01775               $this->data['build'] = SIMPLEPIE_BUILD;
01776 
01777               // Cache the file if caching is enabled
01778               if ($cache && !$cache->save($this))
01779               {
01780                 trigger_error("$this->cache_location is not writeable. Make sure you've set the correct relative or absolute path, and that the location is server-writable.", E_USER_WARNING);
01781               }
01782               return true;
01783             }
01784             else
01785             {
01786               $this->error = "A feed could not be found at $this->feed_url. This does not appear to be a valid RSS or Atom feed.";
01787               SimplePie_Misc::error($this->error, E_USER_NOTICE, __FILE__, __LINE__);
01788               return false;
01789             }
01790           }
01791         }
01792       }
01793       if (isset($parser))
01794       {
01795         // We have an error, just set SimplePie_Misc::error to it and quit
01796         $this->error = sprintf('This XML document is invalid, likely due to invalid characters. XML error: %s at line %d, column %d', $parser->get_error_string(), $parser->get_current_line(), $parser->get_current_column());
01797       }
01798       else
01799       {
01800         $this->error = 'The data could not be converted to UTF-8. You MUST have either the iconv or mbstring extension installed. Upgrading to PHP 5.x (which includes iconv) is highly recommended.';
01801       }
01802       SimplePie_Misc::error($this->error, E_USER_NOTICE, __FILE__, __LINE__);
01803       return false;
01804     }
01805     elseif (!empty($this->multifeed_url))
01806     {
01807       $i = 0;
01808       $success = 0;
01809       $this->multifeed_objects = array();
01810       foreach ($this->multifeed_url as $url)
01811       {
01812         if (SIMPLEPIE_PHP5)
01813         {
01814           // This keyword needs to defy coding standards for PHP4 compatibility
01815           $this->multifeed_objects[$i] = clone($this);
01816         }
01817         else
01818         {
01819           $this->multifeed_objects[$i] = $this;
01820         }
01821         $this->multifeed_objects[$i]->set_feed_url($url);
01822         $success |= $this->multifeed_objects[$i]->init();
01823         $i++;
01824       }
01825       return (bool) $success;
01826     }
01827     else
01828     {
01829       return false;
01830     }
01831   }
01832 
01839   function error()
01840   {
01841     return $this->error;
01842   }
01843 
01844   function get_encoding()
01845   {
01846     return $this->sanitize->output_encoding;
01847   }
01848 
01849   function handle_content_type($mime = 'text/html')
01850   {
01851     if (!headers_sent())
01852     {
01853       $header = "Content-type: $mime;";
01854       if ($this->get_encoding())
01855       {
01856         $header .= ' charset=' . $this->get_encoding();
01857       }
01858       else
01859       {
01860         $header .= ' charset=UTF-8';
01861       }
01862       header($header);
01863     }
01864   }
01865 
01866   function get_type()
01867   {
01868     if (!isset($this->data['type']))
01869     {
01870       $this->data['type'] = SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ALL;
01871       if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed']))
01872       {
01873         $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_10;
01874       }
01875       elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed']))
01876       {
01877         $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_03;
01878       }
01879       elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF']))
01880       {
01881         if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['channel'])
01882         || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['image'])
01883         || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['item'])
01884         || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['textinput']))
01885         {
01886           $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10;
01887         }
01888         if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['channel'])
01889         || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['image'])
01890         || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['item'])
01891         || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['textinput']))
01892         {
01893           $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090;
01894         }
01895       }
01896       elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss']))
01897       {
01898         $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_ALL;
01899         if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['attribs']['']['version']))
01900         {
01901           switch (trim($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['attribs']['']['version']))
01902           {
01903             case '0.91':
01904               $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091;
01905               if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['skiphours']['hour'][0]['data']))
01906               {
01907                 switch (trim($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['skiphours']['hour'][0]['data']))
01908                 {
01909                   case '0':
01910                     $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091_NETSCAPE;
01911                     break;
01912 
01913                   case '24':
01914                     $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091_USERLAND;
01915                     break;
01916                 }
01917               }
01918               break;
01919 
01920             case '0.92':
01921               $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_092;
01922               break;
01923 
01924             case '0.93':
01925               $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_093;
01926               break;
01927 
01928             case '0.94':
01929               $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_094;
01930               break;
01931 
01932             case '2.0':
01933               $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_20;
01934               break;
01935           }
01936         }
01937       }
01938       else
01939       {
01940         $this->data['type'] = SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_NONE;
01941       }
01942     }
01943     return $this->data['type'];
01944   }
01945 
01953   function get_favicon()
01954   {
01955     if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'icon'))
01956     {
01957       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
01958     }
01959     elseif (($url = $this->get_link()) !== null && preg_match('/^http(s)?:\/\//i', $url))
01960     {
01961       $favicon = SimplePie_Misc::absolutize_url('/favicon.ico', $url);
01962 
01963       if ($this->cache && $this->favicon_handler)
01964       {
01965         $favicon_filename = call_user_func($this->cache_name_function, $favicon);
01966         $cache = call_user_func(array($this->cache_class, 'create'), $this->cache_location, $favicon_filename, 'spi');
01967 
01968         if ($cache->load())
01969         {
01970           return $this->sanitize($this->favicon_handler . $favicon_filename, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
01971         }
01972         else
01973         {
01974           $file = new $this->file_class($favicon, $this->timeout / 10, 5, array('X-FORWARDED-FOR' => $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']), $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen);
01975 
01976           if ($file->success && ($file->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE === 0 || ($file->status_code === 200 || $file->status_code > 206 && $file->status_code < 300)) && strlen($file->body) > 0)
01977           {
01978             $sniffer = new $this->content_type_sniffer_class($file);
01979             if (substr($sniffer->get_type(), 0, 6) === 'image/')
01980             {
01981               if ($cache->save(array('headers' => $file->headers, 'body' => $file->body)))
01982               {
01983                 return $this->sanitize($this->favicon_handler . $favicon_filename, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
01984               }
01985               else
01986               {
01987                 trigger_error("$cache->name is not writeable. Make sure you've set the correct relative or absolute path, and that the location is server-writable.", E_USER_WARNING);
01988                 return $this->sanitize($favicon, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
01989               }
01990             }
01991             // not an image
01992             else
01993             {
01994               return false;
01995             }
01996           }
01997         }
01998       }
01999       else
02000       {
02001         return $this->sanitize($favicon, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02002       }
02003     }
02004     return false;
02005   }
02006 
02012   function subscribe_url()
02013   {
02014     if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02015     {
02016       return $this->sanitize($this->feed_url, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02017     }
02018     else
02019     {
02020       return null;
02021     }
02022   }
02023 
02024   function subscribe_feed()
02025   {
02026     if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02027     {
02028       return $this->sanitize(SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($this->feed_url, 2), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02029     }
02030     else
02031     {
02032       return null;
02033     }
02034   }
02035 
02036   function subscribe_outlook()
02037   {
02038     if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02039     {
02040       return $this->sanitize('outlook' . SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($this->feed_url, 2), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02041     }
02042     else
02043     {
02044       return null;
02045     }
02046   }
02047 
02048   function subscribe_podcast()
02049   {
02050     if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02051     {
02052       return $this->sanitize(SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($this->feed_url, 3), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02053     }
02054     else
02055     {
02056       return null;
02057     }
02058   }
02059 
02060   function subscribe_itunes()
02061   {
02062     if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02063     {
02064       return $this->sanitize(SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($this->feed_url, 4), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02065     }
02066     else
02067     {
02068       return null;
02069     }
02070   }
02071 
02081   function subscribe_service($feed_url, $site_url = null)
02082   {
02083     if ($this->subscribe_url())
02084     {
02085       $return = $feed_url . rawurlencode($this->feed_url);
02086       if ($site_url !== null && $this->get_link() !== null)
02087       {
02088         $return .= $site_url . rawurlencode($this->get_link());
02089       }
02090       return $this->sanitize($return, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02091     }
02092     else
02093     {
02094       return null;
02095     }
02096   }
02097 
02098   function subscribe_aol()
02099   {
02100     return $this->subscribe_service('http://feeds.my.aol.com/add.jsp?url=');
02101   }
02102 
02103   function subscribe_bloglines()
02104   {
02105     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.bloglines.com/sub/');
02106   }
02107 
02108   function subscribe_eskobo()
02109   {
02110     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.eskobo.com/?AddToMyPage=');
02111   }
02112 
02113   function subscribe_feedfeeds()
02114   {
02115     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.feedfeeds.com/add?feed=');
02116   }
02117 
02118   function subscribe_feedster()
02119   {
02120     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.feedster.com/myfeedster.php?action=addrss&confirm=no&rssurl=');
02121   }
02122 
02123   function subscribe_google()
02124   {
02125     return $this->subscribe_service('http://fusion.google.com/add?feedurl=');
02126   }
02127 
02128   function subscribe_gritwire()
02129   {
02130     return $this->subscribe_service('http://my.gritwire.com/feeds/addExternalFeed.aspx?FeedUrl=');
02131   }
02132 
02133   function subscribe_msn()
02134   {
02135     return $this->subscribe_service('http://my.msn.com/addtomymsn.armx?id=rss&ut=', '&ru=');
02136   }
02137 
02138   function subscribe_netvibes()
02139   {
02140     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.netvibes.com/subscribe.php?url=');
02141   }
02142 
02143   function subscribe_newsburst()
02144   {
02145     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.newsburst.com/Source/?add=');
02146   }
02147 
02148   function subscribe_newsgator()
02149   {
02150     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.newsgator.com/ngs/subscriber/subext.aspx?url=');
02151   }
02152 
02153   function subscribe_odeo()
02154   {
02155     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.odeo.com/listen/subscribe?feed=');
02156   }
02157 
02158   function subscribe_podnova()
02159   {
02160     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.podnova.com/index_your_podcasts.srf?action=add&url=');
02161   }
02162 
02163   function subscribe_rojo()
02164   {
02165     return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.rojo.com/add-subscription?resource=');
02166   }
02167 
02168   function subscribe_yahoo()
02169   {
02170     return $this->subscribe_service('http://add.my.yahoo.com/rss?url=');
02171   }
02172 
02173   function get_feed_tags($namespace, $tag)
02174   {
02175     $type = $this->get_type();
02176     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_10)
02177     {
02178       if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02179       {
02180         return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02181       }
02182     }
02183     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_03)
02184     {
02185       if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02186       {
02187         return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02188       }
02189     }
02190     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_RDF)
02191     {
02192       if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02193       {
02194         return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02195       }
02196     }
02197     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION)
02198     {
02199       if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02200       {
02201         return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02202       }
02203     }
02204     return null;
02205   }
02206 
02207   function get_channel_tags($namespace, $tag)
02208   {
02209     $type = $this->get_type();
02210     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_ALL)
02211     {
02212       if ($return = $this->get_feed_tags($namespace, $tag))
02213       {
02214         return $return;
02215       }
02216     }
02217     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10)
02218     {
02219       if ($channel = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'channel'))
02220       {
02221         if (isset($channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02222         {
02223           return $channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02224         }
02225       }
02226     }
02227     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090)
02228     {
02229       if ($channel = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'channel'))
02230       {
02231         if (isset($channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02232         {
02233           return $channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02234         }
02235       }
02236     }
02237     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION)
02238     {
02239       if ($channel = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'channel'))
02240       {
02241         if (isset($channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02242         {
02243           return $channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02244         }
02245       }
02246     }
02247     return null;
02248   }
02249 
02250   function get_image_tags($namespace, $tag)
02251   {
02252     $type = $this->get_type();
02253     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10)
02254     {
02255       if ($image = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'image'))
02256       {
02257         if (isset($image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02258         {
02259           return $image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02260         }
02261       }
02262     }
02263     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090)
02264     {
02265       if ($image = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'image'))
02266       {
02267         if (isset($image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02268         {
02269           return $image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02270         }
02271       }
02272     }
02273     if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION)
02274     {
02275       if ($image = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'image'))
02276       {
02277         if (isset($image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02278         {
02279           return $image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02280         }
02281       }
02282     }
02283     return null;
02284   }
02285 
02286   function get_base($element = array())
02287   {
02288     if (!($this->get_type() & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION) && !empty($element['xml_base_explicit']) && isset($element['xml_base']))
02289     {
02290       return $element['xml_base'];
02291     }
02292     elseif ($this->get_link() !== null)
02293     {
02294       return $this->get_link();
02295     }
02296     else
02297     {
02298       return $this->subscribe_url();
02299     }
02300   }
02301 
02302   function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
02303   {
02304     return $this->sanitize->sanitize($data, $type, $base);
02305   }
02306 
02307   function get_title()
02308   {
02309     if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'title'))
02310     {
02311       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02312     }
02313     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'title'))
02314     {
02315       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02316     }
02317     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
02318     {
02319       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02320     }
02321     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
02322     {
02323       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02324     }
02325     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
02326     {
02327       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02328     }
02329     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
02330     {
02331       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02332     }
02333     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
02334     {
02335       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02336     }
02337     else
02338     {
02339       return null;
02340     }
02341   }
02342 
02343   function get_category($key = 0)
02344   {
02345     $categories = $this->get_categories();
02346     if (isset($categories[$key]))
02347     {
02348       return $categories[$key];
02349     }
02350     else
02351     {
02352       return null;
02353     }
02354   }
02355 
02356   function get_categories()
02357   {
02358     $categories = array();
02359 
02360     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'category') as $category)
02361     {
02362       $term = null;
02363       $scheme = null;
02364       $label = null;
02365       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['term']))
02366       {
02367         $term = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['term'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02368       }
02369       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
02370       {
02371         $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02372       }
02373       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
02374       {
02375         $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02376       }
02377       $categories[] = new $this->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
02378     }
02379     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'category') as $category)
02380     {
02381       // This is really the label, but keep this as the term also for BC.
02382       // Label will also work on retrieving because that falls back to term.
02383       $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02384       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['domain']))
02385       {
02386         $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['domain'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02387       }
02388       else
02389       {
02390         $scheme = null;
02391       }
02392       $categories[] = new $this->category_class($term, $scheme, null);
02393     }
02394     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'subject') as $category)
02395     {
02396       $categories[] = new $this->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02397     }
02398     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'subject') as $category)
02399     {
02400       $categories[] = new $this->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02401     }
02402 
02403     if (!empty($categories))
02404     {
02405       return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories);
02406     }
02407     else
02408     {
02409       return null;
02410     }
02411   }
02412 
02413   function get_author($key = 0)
02414   {
02415     $authors = $this->get_authors();
02416     if (isset($authors[$key]))
02417     {
02418       return $authors[$key];
02419     }
02420     else
02421     {
02422       return null;
02423     }
02424   }
02425 
02426   function get_authors()
02427   {
02428     $authors = array();
02429     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'author') as $author)
02430     {
02431       $name = null;
02432       $uri = null;
02433       $email = null;
02434       if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
02435       {
02436         $name = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02437       }
02438       if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
02439       {
02440         $uri = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
02441       }
02442       if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
02443       {
02444         $email = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02445       }
02446       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
02447       {
02448         $authors[] = new $this->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
02449       }
02450     }
02451     if ($author = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'author'))
02452     {
02453       $name = null;
02454       $url = null;
02455       $email = null;
02456       if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
02457       {
02458         $name = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02459       }
02460       if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
02461       {
02462         $url = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
02463       }
02464       if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
02465       {
02466         $email = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02467       }
02468       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
02469       {
02470         $authors[] = new $this->author_class($name, $url, $email);
02471       }
02472     }
02473     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'creator') as $author)
02474     {
02475       $authors[] = new $this->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02476     }
02477     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'creator') as $author)
02478     {
02479       $authors[] = new $this->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02480     }
02481     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'author') as $author)
02482     {
02483       $authors[] = new $this->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02484     }
02485 
02486     if (!empty($authors))
02487     {
02488       return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($authors);
02489     }
02490     else
02491     {
02492       return null;
02493     }
02494   }
02495 
02496   function get_contributor($key = 0)
02497   {
02498     $contributors = $this->get_contributors();
02499     if (isset($contributors[$key]))
02500     {
02501       return $contributors[$key];
02502     }
02503     else
02504     {
02505       return null;
02506     }
02507   }
02508 
02509   function get_contributors()
02510   {
02511     $contributors = array();
02512     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'contributor') as $contributor)
02513     {
02514       $name = null;
02515       $uri = null;
02516       $email = null;
02517       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
02518       {
02519         $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02520       }
02521       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
02522       {
02523         $uri = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
02524       }
02525       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
02526       {
02527         $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02528       }
02529       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
02530       {
02531         $contributors[] = new $this->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
02532       }
02533     }
02534     foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'contributor') as $contributor)
02535     {
02536       $name = null;
02537       $url = null;
02538       $email = null;
02539       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
02540       {
02541         $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02542       }
02543       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
02544       {
02545         $url = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
02546       }
02547       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
02548       {
02549         $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02550       }
02551       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
02552       {
02553         $contributors[] = new $this->author_class($name, $url, $email);
02554       }
02555     }
02556 
02557     if (!empty($contributors))
02558     {
02559       return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($contributors);
02560     }
02561     else
02562     {
02563       return null;
02564     }
02565   }
02566 
02567   function get_link($key = 0, $rel = 'alternate')
02568   {
02569     $links = $this->get_links($rel);
02570     if (isset($links[$key]))
02571     {
02572       return $links[$key];
02573     }
02574     else
02575     {
02576       return null;
02577     }
02578   }
02579 
02583   function get_permalink()
02584   {
02585     return $this->get_link(0);
02586   }
02587 
02588   function get_links($rel = 'alternate')
02589   {
02590     if (!isset($this->data['links']))
02591     {
02592       $this->data['links'] = array();
02593       if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link'))
02594       {
02595         foreach ($links as $link)
02596         {
02597           if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
02598           {
02599             $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
02600             $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
02601           }
02602         }
02603       }
02604       if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link'))
02605       {
02606         foreach ($links as $link)
02607         {
02608           if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
02609           {
02610             $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
02611             $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
02612 
02613           }
02614         }
02615       }
02616       if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
02617       {
02618         $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
02619       }
02620       if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
02621       {
02622         $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
02623       }
02624       if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
02625       {
02626         $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
02627       }
02628 
02629       $keys = array_keys($this->data['links']);
02630       foreach ($keys as $key)
02631       {
02632         if (SimplePie_Misc::is_isegment_nz_nc($key))
02633         {
02634           if (isset($this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]))
02635           {
02636             $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] = array_merge($this->data['links'][$key], $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]);
02637             $this->data['links'][$key] =& $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key];
02638           }
02639           else
02640           {
02641             $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
02642           }
02643         }
02644         elseif (substr($key, 0, 41) === SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY)
02645         {
02646           $this->data['links'][substr($key, 41)] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
02647         }
02648         $this->data['links'][$key] = array_unique($this->data['links'][$key]);
02649       }
02650     }
02651 
02652     if (isset($this->data['links'][$rel]))
02653     {
02654       return $this->data['links'][$rel];
02655     }
02656     else
02657     {
02658       return null;
02659     }
02660   }
02661 
02662   function get_all_discovered_feeds()
02663   {
02664     return $this->all_discovered_feeds;
02665   }
02666 
02667   function get_description()
02668   {
02669     if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'subtitle'))
02670     {
02671       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02672     }
02673     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'tagline'))
02674     {
02675       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02676     }
02677     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'description'))
02678     {
02679       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02680     }
02681     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'description'))
02682     {
02683       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02684     }
02685     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'description'))
02686     {
02687       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02688     }
02689     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'description'))
02690     {
02691       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02692     }
02693     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'description'))
02694     {
02695       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02696     }
02697     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'summary'))
02698     {
02699       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02700     }
02701     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'subtitle'))
02702     {
02703       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02704     }
02705     else
02706     {
02707       return null;
02708     }
02709   }
02710 
02711   function get_copyright()
02712   {
02713     if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'rights'))
02714     {
02715       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02716     }
02717     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'copyright'))
02718     {
02719       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02720     }
02721     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'copyright'))
02722     {
02723       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02724     }
02725     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'rights'))
02726     {
02727       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02728     }
02729     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'rights'))
02730     {
02731       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02732     }
02733     else
02734     {
02735       return null;
02736     }
02737   }
02738 
02739   function get_language()
02740   {
02741     if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'language'))
02742     {
02743       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02744     }
02745     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'language'))
02746     {
02747       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02748     }
02749     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'language'))
02750     {
02751       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02752     }
02753     elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['xml_lang']))
02754     {
02755       return $this->sanitize($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02756     }
02757     elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['xml_lang']))
02758     {
02759       return $this->sanitize($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02760     }
02761     elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['xml_lang']))
02762     {
02763       return $this->sanitize($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02764     }
02765     elseif (isset($this->data['headers']['content-language']))
02766     {
02767       return $this->sanitize($this->data['headers']['content-language'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02768     }
02769     else
02770     {
02771       return null;
02772     }
02773   }
02774 
02775   function get_latitude()
02776   {
02777     
02778     if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lat'))
02779     {
02780       return (float) $return[0]['data'];
02781     }
02782     elseif (($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
02783     {
02784       return (float) $match[1];
02785     }
02786     else
02787     {
02788       return null;
02789     }
02790   }
02791 
02792   function get_longitude()
02793   {
02794     if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'long'))
02795     {
02796       return (float) $return[0]['data'];
02797     }
02798     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lon'))
02799     {
02800       return (float) $return[0]['data'];
02801     }
02802     elseif (($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
02803     {
02804       return (float) $match[2];
02805     }
02806     else
02807     {
02808       return null;
02809     }
02810   }
02811 
02812   function get_image_title()
02813   {
02814     if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
02815     {
02816       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02817     }
02818     elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
02819     {
02820       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02821     }
02822     elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
02823     {
02824       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02825     }
02826     elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
02827     {
02828       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02829     }
02830     elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
02831     {
02832       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02833     }
02834     else
02835     {
02836       return null;
02837     }
02838   }
02839 
02840   function get_image_url()
02841   {
02842     if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'image'))
02843     {
02844       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02845     }
02846     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'logo'))
02847     {
02848       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02849     }
02850     elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'icon'))
02851     {
02852       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02853     }
02854     elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'url'))
02855     {
02856       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02857     }
02858     elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'url'))
02859     {
02860       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02861     }
02862     elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'url'))
02863     {
02864       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02865     }
02866     else
02867     {
02868       return null;
02869     }
02870   }
02871 
02872   function get_image_link()
02873   {
02874     if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
02875     {
02876       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02877     }
02878     elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
02879     {
02880       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02881     }
02882     elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
02883     {
02884       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02885     }
02886     else
02887     {
02888       return null;
02889     }
02890   }
02891 
02892   function get_image_width()
02893   {
02894     if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'width'))
02895     {
02896       return round($return[0]['data']);
02897     }
02898     elseif ($this->get_type() & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION && $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'url'))
02899     {
02900       return 88.0;
02901     }
02902     else
02903     {
02904       return null;
02905     }
02906   }
02907 
02908   function get_image_height()
02909   {
02910     if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'height'))
02911     {
02912       return round($return[0]['data']);
02913     }
02914     elseif ($this->get_type() & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION && $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'url'))
02915     {
02916       return 31.0;
02917     }
02918     else
02919     {
02920       return null;
02921     }
02922   }
02923 
02924   function get_item_quantity($max = 0)
02925   {
02926     $max = (int) $max;
02927     $qty = count($this->get_items());
02928     if ($max === 0)
02929     {
02930       return $qty;
02931     }
02932     else
02933     {
02934       return ($qty > $max) ? $max : $qty;
02935     }
02936   }
02937 
02938   function get_item($key = 0)
02939   {
02940     $items = $this->get_items();
02941     if (isset($items[$key]))
02942     {
02943       return $items[$key];
02944     }
02945     else
02946     {
02947       return null;
02948     }
02949   }
02950 
02951   function get_items($start = 0, $end = 0)
02952   {
02953     if (!isset($this->data['items']))
02954     {
02955       if (!empty($this->multifeed_objects))
02956       {
02957         $this->data['items'] = SimplePie::merge_items($this->multifeed_objects, $start, $end, $this->item_limit);
02958       }
02959       else
02960       {
02961         $this->data['items'] = array();
02962         if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'entry'))
02963         {
02964           $keys = array_keys($items);
02965           foreach ($keys as $key)
02966           {
02967             $this->data['items'][] = new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
02968           }
02969         }
02970         if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'entry'))
02971         {
02972           $keys = array_keys($items);
02973           foreach ($keys as $key)
02974           {
02975             $this->data['items'][] = new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
02976           }
02977         }
02978         if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'item'))
02979         {
02980           $keys = array_keys($items);
02981           foreach ($keys as $key)
02982           {
02983             $this->data['items'][] = new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
02984           }
02985         }
02986         if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'item'))
02987         {
02988           $keys = array_keys($items);
02989           foreach ($keys as $key)
02990           {
02991             $this->data['items'][] = new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
02992           }
02993         }
02994         if ($items = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'item'))
02995         {
02996           $keys = array_keys($items);
02997           foreach ($keys as $key)
02998           {
02999             $this->data['items'][] = new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
03000           }
03001         }
03002       }
03003     }
03004 
03005     if (!empty($this->data['items']))
03006     {
03007       // If we want to order it by date, check if all items have a date, and then sort it
03008       if ($this->order_by_date && empty($this->multifeed_objects))
03009       {
03010         if (!isset($this->data['ordered_items']))
03011         {
03012           $do_sort = true;
03013           foreach ($this->data['items'] as $item)
03014           {
03015             if (!$item->get_date('U'))
03016             {
03017               $do_sort = false;
03018               break;
03019             }
03020           }
03021           $item = null;
03022           $this->data['ordered_items'] = $this->data['items'];
03023           if ($do_sort)
03024           {
03025             usort($this->data['ordered_items'], array(&$this, 'sort_items'));
03026           }
03027         }
03028         $items = $this->data['ordered_items'];
03029       }
03030       else
03031       {
03032         $items = $this->data['items'];
03033       }
03034 
03035       // Slice the data as desired
03036       if ($end === 0)
03037       {
03038         return array_slice($items, $start);
03039       }
03040       else
03041       {
03042         return array_slice($items, $start, $end);
03043       }
03044     }
03045     else
03046     {
03047       return array();
03048     }
03049   }
03050 
03054   function sort_items($a, $b)
03055   {
03056     return $a->get_date('U') <= $b->get_date('U');
03057   }
03058 
03062   function merge_items($urls, $start = 0, $end = 0, $limit = 0)
03063   {
03064     if (is_array($urls) && sizeof($urls) > 0)
03065     {
03066       $items = array();
03067       foreach ($urls as $arg)
03068       {
03069         if (is_a($arg, 'SimplePie'))
03070         {
03071           $items = array_merge($items, $arg->get_items(0, $limit));
03072         }
03073         else
03074         {
03075           trigger_error('Arguments must be SimplePie objects', E_USER_WARNING);
03076         }
03077       }
03078 
03079       $do_sort = true;
03080       foreach ($items as $item)
03081       {
03082         if (!$item->get_date('U'))
03083         {
03084           $do_sort = false;
03085           break;
03086         }
03087       }
03088       $item = null;
03089       if ($do_sort)
03090       {
03091         usort($items, array('SimplePie', 'sort_items'));
03092       }
03093 
03094       if ($end === 0)
03095       {
03096         return array_slice($items, $start);
03097       }
03098       else
03099       {
03100         return array_slice($items, $start, $end);
03101       }
03102     }
03103     else
03104     {
03105       trigger_error('Cannot merge zero SimplePie objects', E_USER_WARNING);
03106       return array();
03107     }
03108   }
03109 }
03110 
03111 class SimplePie_Item
03112 {
03113   var $feed;
03114   var $data = array();
03115 
03116   function SimplePie_Item($feed, $data)
03117   {
03118     $this->feed = $feed;
03119     $this->data = $data;
03120   }
03121 
03122   function __toString()
03123   {
03124     return md5(serialize($this->data));
03125   }
03126 
03130   function __destruct()
03131   {
03132     if ((version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.3', '<') || !gc_enabled()) && !ini_get('zend.ze1_compatibility_mode'))
03133     {
03134       unset($this->feed);
03135     }
03136   }
03137 
03138   function get_item_tags($namespace, $tag)
03139   {
03140     if (isset($this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
03141     {
03142       return $this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag];
03143     }
03144     else
03145     {
03146       return null;
03147     }
03148   }
03149 
03150   function get_base($element = array())
03151   {
03152     return $this->feed->get_base($element);
03153   }
03154 
03155   function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
03156   {
03157     return $this->feed->sanitize($data, $type, $base);
03158   }
03159 
03160   function get_feed()
03161   {
03162     return $this->feed;
03163   }
03164 
03165   function get_id($hash = false)
03166   {
03167     if (!$hash)
03168     {
03169       if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'id'))
03170       {
03171         return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03172       }
03173       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'id'))
03174       {
03175         return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03176       }
03177       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'guid'))
03178       {
03179         return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03180       }
03181       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'identifier'))
03182       {
03183         return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03184       }
03185       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'identifier'))
03186       {
03187         return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03188       }
03189       elseif (($return = $this->get_permalink()) !== null)
03190       {
03191         return $return;
03192       }
03193       elseif (($return = $this->get_title()) !== null)
03194       {
03195         return $return;
03196       }
03197     }
03198     if ($this->get_permalink() !== null || $this->get_title() !== null)
03199     {
03200       return md5($this->get_permalink() . $this->get_title());
03201     }
03202     else
03203     {
03204       return md5(serialize($this->data));
03205     }
03206   }
03207 
03208   function get_title()
03209   {
03210     if (!isset($this->data['title']))
03211     {
03212       if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'title'))
03213       {
03214         $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03215       }
03216       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'title'))
03217       {
03218         $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03219       }
03220       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
03221       {
03222         $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03223       }
03224       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
03225       {
03226         $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03227       }
03228       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
03229       {
03230         $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03231       }
03232       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
03233       {
03234         $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03235       }
03236       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
03237       {
03238         $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03239       }
03240       else
03241       {
03242         $this->data['title'] = null;
03243       }
03244     }
03245     return $this->data['title'];
03246   }
03247 
03248   function get_description($description_only = false)
03249   {
03250     if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'summary'))
03251     {
03252       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03253     }
03254     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'summary'))
03255     {
03256       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03257     }
03258     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'description'))
03259     {
03260       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03261     }
03262     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'description'))
03263     {
03264       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03265     }
03266     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'description'))
03267     {
03268       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03269     }
03270     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'description'))
03271     {
03272       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03273     }
03274     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'summary'))
03275     {
03276       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03277     }
03278     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'subtitle'))
03279     {
03280       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03281     }
03282     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'description'))
03283     {
03284       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML);
03285     }
03286 
03287     elseif (!$description_only)
03288     {
03289       return $this->get_content(true);
03290     }
03291     else
03292     {
03293       return null;
03294     }
03295   }
03296 
03297   function get_content($content_only = false)
03298   {
03299     if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'content'))
03300     {
03301       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_content_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03302     }
03303     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'content'))
03304     {
03305       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03306     }
03307     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10_MODULES_CONTENT, 'encoded'))
03308     {
03309       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03310     }
03311     elseif (!$content_only)
03312     {
03313       return $this->get_description(true);
03314     }
03315     else
03316     {
03317       return null;
03318     }
03319   }
03320 
03321   function get_category($key = 0)
03322   {
03323     $categories = $this->get_categories();
03324     if (isset($categories[$key]))
03325     {
03326       return $categories[$key];
03327     }
03328     else
03329     {
03330       return null;
03331     }
03332   }
03333 
03334   function get_categories()
03335   {
03336     $categories = array();
03337 
03338     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'category') as $category)
03339     {
03340       $term = null;
03341       $scheme = null;
03342       $label = null;
03343       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['term']))
03344       {
03345         $term = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['term'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03346       }
03347       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
03348       {
03349         $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03350       }
03351       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
03352       {
03353         $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03354       }
03355       $categories[] = new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03356     }
03357     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'category') as $category)
03358     {
03359       // This is really the label, but keep this as the term also for BC.
03360       // Label will also work on retrieving because that falls back to term.
03361       $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03362       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['domain']))
03363       {
03364         $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['domain'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03365       }
03366       else
03367       {
03368         $scheme = null;
03369       }
03370       $categories[] = new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, null);
03371     }
03372     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'subject') as $category)
03373     {
03374       $categories[] = new $this->feed->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03375     }
03376     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'subject') as $category)
03377     {
03378       $categories[] = new $this->feed->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03379     }
03380 
03381     if (!empty($categories))
03382     {
03383       return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories);
03384     }
03385     else
03386     {
03387       return null;
03388     }
03389   }
03390 
03391   function get_author($key = 0)
03392   {
03393     $authors = $this->get_authors();
03394     if (isset($authors[$key]))
03395     {
03396       return $authors[$key];
03397     }
03398     else
03399     {
03400       return null;
03401     }
03402   }
03403 
03404   function get_contributor($key = 0)
03405   {
03406     $contributors = $this->get_contributors();
03407     if (isset($contributors[$key]))
03408     {
03409       return $contributors[$key];
03410     }
03411     else
03412     {
03413       return null;
03414     }
03415   }
03416 
03417   function get_contributors()
03418   {
03419     $contributors = array();
03420     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'contributor') as $contributor)
03421     {
03422       $name = null;
03423       $uri = null;
03424       $email = null;
03425       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
03426       {
03427         $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03428       }
03429       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
03430       {
03431         $uri = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
03432       }
03433       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
03434       {
03435         $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03436       }
