03437       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
03438       {
03439         $contributors[] = new $this->feed->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
03440       }
03441     }
03442     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'contributor') as $contributor)
03443     {
03444       $name = null;
03445       $url = null;
03446       $email = null;
03447       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
03448       {
03449         $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03450       }
03451       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
03452       {
03453         $url = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
03454       }
03455       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
03456       {
03457         $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03458       }
03459       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
03460       {
03461         $contributors[] = new $this->feed->author_class($name, $url, $email);
03462       }
03463     }
03464 
03465     if (!empty($contributors))
03466     {
03467       return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($contributors);
03468     }
03469     else
03470     {
03471       return null;
03472     }
03473   }
03474 
03475   function get_authors()
03476   {
03477     $authors = array();
03478     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'author') as $author)
03479     {
03480       $name = null;
03481       $uri = null;
03482       $email = null;
03483       if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
03484       {
03485         $name = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03486       }
03487       if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
03488       {
03489         $uri = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
03490       }
03491       if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
03492       {
03493         $email = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03494       }
03495       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
03496       {
03497         $authors[] = new $this->feed->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
03498       }
03499     }
03500     if ($author = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'author'))
03501     {
03502       $name = null;
03503       $url = null;
03504       $email = null;
03505       if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
03506       {
03507         $name = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03508       }
03509       if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
03510       {
03511         $url = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
03512       }
03513       if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
03514       {
03515         $email = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03516       }
03517       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
03518       {
03519         $authors[] = new $this->feed->author_class($name, $url, $email);
03520       }
03521     }
03522     if ($author = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'author'))
03523     {
03524       $authors[] = new $this->feed->author_class(null, null, $this->sanitize($author[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
03525     }
03526     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'creator') as $author)
03527     {
03528       $authors[] = new $this->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03529     }
03530     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'creator') as $author)
03531     {
03532       $authors[] = new $this->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03533     }
03534     foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'author') as $author)
03535     {
03536       $authors[] = new $this->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03537     }
03538 
03539     if (!empty($authors))
03540     {
03541       return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($authors);
03542     }
03543     elseif (($source = $this->get_source()) && ($authors = $source->get_authors()))
03544     {
03545       return $authors;
03546     }
03547     elseif ($authors = $this->feed->get_authors())
03548     {
03549       return $authors;
03550     }
03551     else
03552     {
03553       return null;
03554     }
03555   }
03556 
03557   function get_copyright()
03558   {
03559     if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'rights'))
03560     {
03561       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03562     }
03563     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'rights'))
03564     {
03565       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03566     }
03567     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'rights'))
03568     {
03569       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03570     }
03571     else
03572     {
03573       return null;
03574     }
03575   }
03576 
03577   function get_date($date_format = 'j F Y, g:i a')
03578   {
03579     if (!isset($this->data['date']))
03580     {
03581       if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'published'))
03582       {
03583         $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03584       }
03585       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'updated'))
03586       {
03587         $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03588       }
03589       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'issued'))
03590       {
03591         $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03592       }
03593       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'created'))
03594       {
03595         $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03596       }
03597       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'modified'))
03598       {
03599         $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03600       }
03601       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'pubDate'))
03602       {
03603         $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03604       }
03605       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'date'))
03606       {
03607         $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03608       }
03609       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'date'))
03610       {
03611         $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03612       }
03613 
03614       if (!empty($this->data['date']['raw']))
03615       {
03616         $parser = SimplePie_Parse_Date::get();
03617         $this->data['date']['parsed'] = $parser->parse($this->data['date']['raw']);
03618       }
03619       else
03620       {
03621         $this->data['date'] = null;
03622       }
03623     }
03624     if ($this->data['date'])
03625     {
03626       $date_format = (string) $date_format;
03627       switch ($date_format)
03628       {
03629         case '':
03630           return $this->sanitize($this->data['date']['raw'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03631 
03632         case 'U':
03633           return $this->data['date']['parsed'];
03634 
03635         default:
03636           return date($date_format, $this->data['date']['parsed']);
03637       }
03638     }
03639     else
03640     {
03641       return null;
03642     }
03643   }
03644 
03645   function get_local_date($date_format = '%c')
03646   {
03647     if (!$date_format)
03648     {
03649       return $this->sanitize($this->get_date(''), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03650     }
03651     elseif (($date = $this->get_date('U')) !== null && $date !== false)
03652     {
03653       return strftime($date_format, $date);
03654     }
03655     else
03656     {
03657       return null;
03658     }
03659   }
03660 
03661   function get_permalink()
03662   {
03663     $link = $this->get_link();
03664     $enclosure = $this->get_enclosure(0);
03665     if ($link !== null)
03666     {
03667       return $link;
03668     }
03669     elseif ($enclosure !== null)
03670     {
03671       return $enclosure->get_link();
03672     }
03673     else
03674     {
03675       return null;
03676     }
03677   }
03678 
03679   function get_link($key = 0, $rel = 'alternate')
03680   {
03681     $links = $this->get_links($rel);
03682     if ($links[$key] !== null)
03683     {
03684       return $links[$key];
03685     }
03686     else
03687     {
03688       return null;
03689     }
03690   }
03691 
03692   function get_links($rel = 'alternate')
03693   {
03694     if (!isset($this->data['links']))
03695     {
03696       $this->data['links'] = array();
03697       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link') as $link)
03698       {
03699         if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
03700         {
03701           $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
03702           $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
03703 
03704         }
03705       }
03706       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link') as $link)
03707       {
03708         if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
03709         {
03710           $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
03711           $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
03712         }
03713       }
03714       if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
03715       {
03716         $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
03717       }
03718       if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
03719       {
03720         $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
03721       }
03722       if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
03723       {
03724         $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
03725       }
03726       if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'guid'))
03727       {
03728         if (!isset($links[0]['attribs']['']['isPermaLink']) || strtolower(trim($links[0]['attribs']['']['isPermaLink'])) === 'true')
03729         {
03730           $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
03731         }
03732       }
03733 
03734       $keys = array_keys($this->data['links']);
03735       foreach ($keys as $key)
03736       {
03737         if (SimplePie_Misc::is_isegment_nz_nc($key))
03738         {
03739           if (isset($this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]))
03740           {
03741             $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] = array_merge($this->data['links'][$key], $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]);
03742             $this->data['links'][$key] =& $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key];
03743           }
03744           else
03745           {
03746             $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
03747           }
03748         }
03749         elseif (substr($key, 0, 41) === SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY)
03750         {
03751           $this->data['links'][substr($key, 41)] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
03752         }
03753         $this->data['links'][$key] = array_unique($this->data['links'][$key]);
03754       }
03755     }
03756     if (isset($this->data['links'][$rel]))
03757     {
03758       return $this->data['links'][$rel];
03759     }
03760     else
03761     {
03762       return null;
03763     }
03764   }
03765 
03769   function get_enclosure($key = 0, $prefer = null)
03770   {
03771     $enclosures = $this->get_enclosures();
03772     if (isset($enclosures[$key]))
03773     {
03774       return $enclosures[$key];
03775     }
03776     else
03777     {
03778       return null;
03779     }
03780   }
03781 
03792   function get_enclosures()
03793   {
03794     if (!isset($this->data['enclosures']))
03795     {
03796       $this->data['enclosures'] = array();
03797 
03798       // Elements
03799       $captions_parent = null;
03800       $categories_parent = null;
03801       $copyrights_parent = null;
03802       $credits_parent = null;
03803       $description_parent = null;
03804       $duration_parent = null;
03805       $hashes_parent = null;
03806       $keywords_parent = null;
03807       $player_parent = null;
03808       $ratings_parent = null;
03809       $restrictions_parent = null;
03810       $thumbnails_parent = null;
03811       $title_parent = null;
03812 
03813       // Let's do the channel and item-level ones first, and just re-use them if we need to.
03814       $parent = $this->get_feed();
03815 
03816       // CAPTIONS
03817       if ($captions = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'text'))
03818       {
03819         foreach ($captions as $caption)
03820         {
03821           $caption_type = null;
03822           $caption_lang = null;
03823           $caption_startTime = null;
03824           $caption_endTime = null;
03825           $caption_text = null;
03826           if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
03827           {
03828             $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03829           }
03830           if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
03831           {
03832             $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03833           }
03834           if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
03835           {
03836             $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03837           }
03838           if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
03839           {
03840             $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03841           }
03842           if (isset($caption['data']))
03843           {
03844             $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03845           }
03846           $captions_parent[] = new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
03847         }
03848       }
03849       elseif ($captions = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'text'))
03850       {
03851         foreach ($captions as $caption)
03852         {
03853           $caption_type = null;
03854           $caption_lang = null;
03855           $caption_startTime = null;
03856           $caption_endTime = null;
03857           $caption_text = null;
03858           if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
03859           {
03860             $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03861           }
03862           if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
03863           {
03864             $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03865           }
03866           if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
03867           {
03868             $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03869           }
03870           if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
03871           {
03872             $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03873           }
03874           if (isset($caption['data']))
03875           {
03876             $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03877           }
03878           $captions_parent[] = new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
03879         }
03880       }
03881       if (is_array($captions_parent))
03882       {
03883         $captions_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($captions_parent));
03884       }
03885 
03886       // CATEGORIES
03887       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'category') as $category)
03888       {
03889         $term = null;
03890         $scheme = null;
03891         $label = null;
03892         if (isset($category['data']))
03893         {
03894           $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03895         }
03896         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
03897         {
03898           $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03899         }
03900         else
03901         {
03902           $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
03903         }
03904         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
03905         {
03906           $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03907         }
03908         $categories_parent[] = new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03909       }
03910       foreach ((array) $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'category') as $category)
03911       {
03912         $term = null;
03913         $scheme = null;
03914         $label = null;
03915         if (isset($category['data']))
03916         {
03917           $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03918         }
03919         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
03920         {
03921           $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03922         }
03923         else
03924         {
03925           $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
03926         }
03927         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
03928         {
03929           $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03930         }
03931         $categories_parent[] = new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03932       }
03933       foreach ((array) $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'category') as $category)
03934       {
03935         $term = null;
03936         $scheme = 'http://www.itunes.com/dtds/podcast-1.0.dtd';
03937         $label = null;
03938         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['text']))
03939         {
03940           $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['text'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03941         }
03942         $categories_parent[] = new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03943 
03944         if (isset($category['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES]['category']))
03945         {
03946           foreach ((array) $category['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES]['category'] as $subcategory)
03947           {
03948             if (isset($subcategory['attribs']['']['text']))
03949             {
03950               $label = $this->sanitize($subcategory['attribs']['']['text'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03951             }
03952             $categories_parent[] = new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03953           }
03954         }
03955       }
03956       if (is_array($categories_parent))
03957       {
03958         $categories_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories_parent));
03959       }
03960 
03961       // COPYRIGHT
03962       if ($copyright = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'copyright'))
03963       {
03964         $copyright_url = null;
03965         $copyright_label = null;
03966         if (isset($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
03967         {
03968           $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03969         }
03970         if (isset($copyright[0]['data']))
03971         {
03972           $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03973         }
03974         $copyrights_parent = new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
03975       }
03976       elseif ($copyright = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'copyright'))
03977       {
03978         $copyright_url = null;
03979         $copyright_label = null;
03980         if (isset($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
03981         {
03982           $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03983         }
03984         if (isset($copyright[0]['data']))
03985         {
03986           $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03987         }
03988         $copyrights_parent = new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
03989       }
03990 
03991       // CREDITS
03992       if ($credits = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'credit'))
03993       {
03994         foreach ($credits as $credit)
03995         {
03996           $credit_role = null;
03997           $credit_scheme = null;
03998           $credit_name = null;
03999           if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
04000           {
04001             $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04002           }
04003           if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04004           {
04005             $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04006           }
04007           else
04008           {
04009             $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
04010           }
04011           if (isset($credit['data']))
04012           {
04013             $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04014           }
04015           $credits_parent[] = new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
04016         }
04017       }
04018       elseif ($credits = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'credit'))
04019       {
04020         foreach ($credits as $credit)
04021         {
04022           $credit_role = null;
04023           $credit_scheme = null;
04024           $credit_name = null;
04025           if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
04026           {
04027             $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04028           }
04029           if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04030           {
04031             $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04032           }
04033           else
04034           {
04035             $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
04036           }
04037           if (isset($credit['data']))
04038           {
04039             $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04040           }
04041           $credits_parent[] = new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
04042         }
04043       }
04044       if (is_array($credits_parent))
04045       {
04046         $credits_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($credits_parent));
04047       }
04048 
04049       // DESCRIPTION
04050       if ($description_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'description'))
04051       {
04052         if (isset($description_parent[0]['data']))
04053         {
04054           $description_parent = $this->sanitize($description_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04055         }
04056       }
04057       elseif ($description_parent = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'description'))
04058       {
04059         if (isset($description_parent[0]['data']))
04060         {
04061           $description_parent = $this->sanitize($description_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04062         }
04063       }
04064 
04065       // DURATION
04066       if ($duration_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'duration'))
04067       {
04068         $seconds = null;
04069         $minutes = null;
04070         $hours = null;
04071         if (isset($duration_parent[0]['data']))
04072         {
04073           $temp = explode(':', $this->sanitize($duration_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04074           if (sizeof($temp) > 0)
04075           {
04076             $seconds = (int) array_pop($temp);
04077           }
04078           if (sizeof($temp) > 0)
04079           {
04080             $minutes = (int) array_pop($temp);
04081             $seconds += $minutes * 60;
04082           }
04083           if (sizeof($temp) > 0)
04084           {
04085             $hours = (int) array_pop($temp);
04086             $seconds += $hours * 3600;
04087           }
04088           unset($temp);
04089           $duration_parent = $seconds;
04090         }
04091       }
04092 
04093       // HASHES
04094       if ($hashes_iterator = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'hash'))
04095       {
04096         foreach ($hashes_iterator as $hash)
04097         {
04098           $value = null;
04099           $algo = null;
04100           if (isset($hash['data']))
04101           {
04102             $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04103           }
04104           if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
04105           {
04106             $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04107           }
04108           else
04109           {
04110             $algo = 'md5';
04111           }
04112           $hashes_parent[] = $algo.':'.$value;
04113         }
04114       }
04115       elseif ($hashes_iterator = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'hash'))
04116       {
04117         foreach ($hashes_iterator as $hash)
04118         {
04119           $value = null;
04120           $algo = null;
04121           if (isset($hash['data']))
04122           {
04123             $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04124           }
04125           if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
04126           {
04127             $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04128           }
04129           else
04130           {
04131             $algo = 'md5';
04132           }
04133           $hashes_parent[] = $algo.':'.$value;
04134         }
04135       }
04136       if (is_array($hashes_parent))
04137       {
04138         $hashes_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($hashes_parent));
04139       }
04140 
04141       // KEYWORDS
04142       if ($keywords = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'keywords'))
04143       {
04144         if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
04145         {
04146           $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04147           foreach ($temp as $word)
04148           {
04149             $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
04150           }
04151         }
04152         unset($temp);
04153       }
04154       elseif ($keywords = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'keywords'))
04155       {
04156         if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
04157         {
04158           $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04159           foreach ($temp as $word)
04160           {
04161             $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
04162           }
04163         }
04164         unset($temp);
04165       }
04166       elseif ($keywords = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'keywords'))
04167       {
04168         if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
04169         {
04170           $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04171           foreach ($temp as $word)
04172           {
04173             $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
04174           }
04175         }
04176         unset($temp);
04177       }
04178       elseif ($keywords = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'keywords'))
04179       {
04180         if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
04181         {
04182           $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04183           foreach ($temp as $word)
04184           {
04185             $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
04186           }
04187         }
04188         unset($temp);
04189       }
04190       if (is_array($keywords_parent))
04191       {
04192         $keywords_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($keywords_parent));
04193       }
04194 
04195       // PLAYER
04196       if ($player_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'player'))
04197       {
04198         if (isset($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
04199         {
04200           $player_parent = $this->sanitize($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04201         }
04202       }
04203       elseif ($player_parent = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'player'))
04204       {
04205         if (isset($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
04206         {
04207           $player_parent = $this->sanitize($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04208         }
04209       }
04210 
04211       // RATINGS
04212       if ($ratings = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'rating'))
04213       {
04214         foreach ($ratings as $rating)
04215         {
04216           $rating_scheme = null;
04217           $rating_value = null;
04218           if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04219           {
04220             $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04221           }
04222           else
04223           {
04224             $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
04225           }
04226           if (isset($rating['data']))
04227           {
04228             $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04229           }
04230           $ratings_parent[] = new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04231         }
04232       }
04233       elseif ($ratings = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'explicit'))
04234       {
04235         foreach ($ratings as $rating)
04236         {
04237           $rating_scheme = 'urn:itunes';
04238           $rating_value = null;
04239           if (isset($rating['data']))
04240           {
04241             $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04242           }
04243           $ratings_parent[] = new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04244         }
04245       }
04246       elseif ($ratings = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'rating'))
04247       {
04248         foreach ($ratings as $rating)
04249         {
04250           $rating_scheme = null;
04251           $rating_value = null;
04252           if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04253           {
04254             $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04255           }
04256           else
04257           {
04258             $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
04259           }
04260           if (isset($rating['data']))
04261           {
04262             $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04263           }
04264           $ratings_parent[] = new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04265         }
04266       }
04267       elseif ($ratings = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'explicit'))
04268       {
04269         foreach ($ratings as $rating)
04270         {
04271           $rating_scheme = 'urn:itunes';
04272           $rating_value = null;
04273           if (isset($rating['data']))
04274           {
04275             $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04276           }
04277           $ratings_parent[] = new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04278         }
04279       }
04280       if (is_array($ratings_parent))
04281       {
04282         $ratings_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($ratings_parent));
04283       }
04284 
04285       // RESTRICTIONS
04286       if ($restrictions = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'restriction'))
04287       {
04288         foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
04289         {
04290           $restriction_relationship = null;
04291           $restriction_type = null;
04292           $restriction_value = null;
04293           if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
04294           {
04295             $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04296           }
04297           if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
04298           {
04299             $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04300           }
04301           if (isset($restriction['data']))
04302           {
04303             $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04304           }
04305           $restrictions_parent[] = new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04306         }
04307       }
04308       elseif ($restrictions = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'block'))
04309       {
04310         foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
04311         {
04312           $restriction_relationship = 'allow';
04313           $restriction_type = null;
04314           $restriction_value = 'itunes';
04315           if (isset($restriction['data']) && strtolower($restriction['data']) === 'yes')
04316           {
04317             $restriction_relationship = 'deny';
04318           }
04319           $restrictions_parent[] = new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04320         }
04321       }
04322       elseif ($restrictions = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'restriction'))
04323       {
04324         foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
04325         {
04326           $restriction_relationship = null;
04327           $restriction_type = null;
04328           $restriction_value = null;
04329           if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
04330           {
04331             $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04332           }
04333           if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
04334           {
04335             $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04336           }
04337           if (isset($restriction['data']))
04338           {
04339             $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04340           }
04341           $restrictions_parent[] = new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04342         }
04343       }
04344       elseif ($restrictions = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'block'))
04345       {
04346         foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
04347         {
04348           $restriction_relationship = 'allow';
04349           $restriction_type = null;
04350           $restriction_value = 'itunes';
04351           if (isset($restriction['data']) && strtolower($restriction['data']) === 'yes')
04352           {
04353             $restriction_relationship = 'deny';
04354           }
04355           $restrictions_parent[] = new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04356         }
04357       }
04358       if (is_array($restrictions_parent))
04359       {
04360         $restrictions_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($restrictions_parent));
04361       }
04362 
04363       // THUMBNAILS
04364       if ($thumbnails = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'thumbnail'))
04365       {
04366         foreach ($thumbnails as $thumbnail)
04367         {
04368           if (isset($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url']))
04369           {
04370             $thumbnails_parent[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04371           }
04372         }
04373       }
04374       elseif ($thumbnails = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'thumbnail'))
04375       {
04376         foreach ($thumbnails as $thumbnail)
04377         {
04378           if (isset($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url']))
04379           {
04380             $thumbnails_parent[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04381           }
04382         }
04383       }
04384 
04385       // TITLES
04386       if ($title_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'title'))
04387       {
04388         if (isset($title_parent[0]['data']))
04389         {
04390           $title_parent = $this->sanitize($title_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04391         }
04392       }
04393       elseif ($title_parent = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'title'))
04394       {
04395         if (isset($title_parent[0]['data']))
04396         {
04397           $title_parent = $this->sanitize($title_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04398         }
04399       }
04400 
04401       // Clear the memory
04402       unset($parent);
04403 
04404       // Attributes
04405       $bitrate = null;
04406       $channels = null;
04407       $duration = null;
04408       $expression = null;
04409       $framerate = null;
04410       $height = null;
04411       $javascript = null;
04412       $lang = null;
04413       $length = null;
04414       $medium = null;
04415       $samplingrate = null;
04416       $type = null;
04417       $url = null;
04418       $width = null;
04419 
04420       // Elements
04421       $captions = null;
04422       $categories = null;
04423       $copyrights = null;
04424       $credits = null;
04425       $description = null;
04426       $hashes = null;
04427       $keywords = null;
04428       $player = null;
04429       $ratings = null;
04430       $restrictions = null;
04431       $thumbnails = null;
04432       $title = null;
04433 
04434       // If we have media:group tags, loop through them.
04435       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'group') as $group)
04436       {
04437         if(isset($group['child']) && isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content']))
04438         {
04439           // If we have media:content tags, loop through them.
04440           foreach ((array) $group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content'] as $content)
04441           {
04442             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['url']))
04443             {
04444               // Attributes
04445               $bitrate = null;
04446               $channels = null;
04447               $duration = null;
04448               $expression = null;
04449               $framerate = null;
04450               $height = null;
04451               $javascript = null;
04452               $lang = null;
04453               $length = null;
04454               $medium = null;
04455               $samplingrate = null;
04456               $type = null;
04457               $url = null;
04458               $width = null;
04459 
04460               // Elements
04461               $captions = null;
04462               $categories = null;
04463               $copyrights = null;
04464               $credits = null;
04465               $description = null;
04466               $hashes = null;
04467               $keywords = null;
04468               $player = null;
04469               $ratings = null;
04470               $restrictions = null;
04471               $thumbnails = null;
04472               $title = null;
04473 
04474               // Start checking the attributes of media:content
04475               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['bitrate']))
04476               {
04477                 $bitrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['bitrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04478               }
04479               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['channels']))
04480               {
04481                 $channels = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['channels'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04482               }
04483               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['duration']))
04484               {
04485                 $duration = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['duration'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04486               }
04487               else
04488               {
04489                 $duration = $duration_parent;
04490               }
04491               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['expression']))
04492               {
04493                 $expression = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['expression'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04494               }
04495               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['framerate']))
04496               {
04497                 $framerate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['framerate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04498               }
04499               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['height']))
04500               {
04501                 $height = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['height'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04502               }
04503               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['lang']))
04504               {
04505                 $lang = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04506               }
04507               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']))
04508               {
04509                 $length = ceil($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']);
04510               }
04511               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['medium']))
04512               {
04513                 $medium = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['medium'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04514               }
04515               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate']))
04516               {
04517                 $samplingrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04518               }
04519               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['type']))
04520               {
04521                 $type = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04522               }
04523               if (isset($content['attribs']['']['width']))
04524               {
04525                 $width = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['width'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04526               }
04527               $url = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04528 
04529               // Checking the other optional media: elements. Priority: media:content, media:group, item, channel
04530 
04531               // CAPTIONS
04532               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text']))
04533               {
04534                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text'] as $caption)
04535                 {
04536                   $caption_type = null;
04537                   $caption_lang = null;
04538                   $caption_startTime = null;
04539                   $caption_endTime = null;
04540                   $caption_text = null;
04541                   if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
04542                   {
04543                     $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04544                   }
04545                   if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
04546                   {
04547                     $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04548                   }
04549                   if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
04550                   {
04551                     $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04552                   }
04553                   if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
04554                   {
04555                     $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04556                   }
04557                   if (isset($caption['data']))
04558                   {
04559                     $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04560                   }
04561                   $captions[] = new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
04562                 }
04563                 if (is_array($captions))
04564                 {
04565                   $captions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($captions));
04566                 }
04567               }
04568               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text']))
04569               {
04570                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text'] as $caption)
04571                 {
04572                   $caption_type = null;
04573                   $caption_lang = null;
04574                   $caption_startTime = null;
04575                   $caption_endTime = null;
04576                   $caption_text = null;
04577                   if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
04578                   {
04579                     $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04580                   }
04581                   if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
04582                   {
04583                     $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04584                   }
04585                   if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
04586                   {
04587                     $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04588                   }
04589                   if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
04590                   {
04591                     $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04592                   }
04593                   if (isset($caption['data']))
04594                   {
04595                     $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04596                   }
04597                   $captions[] = new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
04598                 }
04599                 if (is_array($captions))
04600                 {
04601                   $captions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($captions));
04602                 }
04603               }
04604               else
04605               {
04606                 $captions = $captions_parent;
04607               }
04608 
04609               // CATEGORIES
04610               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category']))
04611               {
04612                 foreach ((array) $content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category'] as $category)
04613                 {
04614                   $term = null;
04615                   $scheme = null;
04616                   $label = null;
04617                   if (isset($category['data']))
04618                   {
04619                     $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04620                   }
04621                   if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04622                   {
04623                     $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04624                   }
04625                   else
04626                   {
04627                     $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
04628                   }
04629                   if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
04630                   {
04631                     $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04632                   }
04633                   $categories[] = new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
04634                 }
04635               }
04636               if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category']))
04637               {
04638                 foreach ((array) $group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category'] as $category)
04639                 {
04640                   $term = null;
04641                   $scheme = null;
04642                   $label = null;
04643                   if (isset($category['data']))
04644                   {
04645                     $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04646                   }
04647                   if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04648                   {
04649                     $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04650                   }
04651                   else
04652                   {
04653                     $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
04654                   }
04655                   if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
04656                   {
04657                     $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04658                   }
04659                   $categories[] = new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
04660                 }
04661               }
04662               if (is_array($categories) && is_array($categories_parent))
04663               {
04664                 $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique(array_merge($categories, $categories_parent)));
04665               }
04666               elseif (is_array($categories))
04667               {
04668                 $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories));
04669               }
04670               elseif (is_array($categories_parent))
04671               {
04672                 $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories_parent));
04673               }
04674 
04675               // COPYRIGHTS
04676               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright']))
04677               {
04678                 $copyright_url = null;
04679                 $copyright_label = null;
04680                 if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url']))
04681                 {
04682                   $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04683                 }
04684                 if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data']))
04685                 {
04686                   $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04687                 }
04688                 $copyrights = new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
04689               }
04690               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright']))
04691               {
04692                 $copyright_url = null;
04693                 $copyright_label = null;
04694                 if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url']))
04695                 {
04696                   $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04697                 }
04698                 if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data']))
04699                 {
04700                   $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04701                 }
04702                 $copyrights = new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
04703               }
04704               else
04705               {
04706                 $copyrights = $copyrights_parent;
04707               }
04708 
04709               // CREDITS
04710               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit']))
04711               {
04712                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit'] as $credit)
04713                 {
04714                   $credit_role = null;
04715                   $credit_scheme = null;
04716                   $credit_name = null;
04717                   if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
04718                   {
04719                     $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04720                   }
04721                   if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04722                   {
04723                     $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04724                   }
04725                   else
04726                   {
04727                     $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
04728                   }
04729                   if (isset($credit['data']))
04730                   {
04731                     $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04732                   }
04733                   $credits[] = new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
04734                 }
04735                 if (is_array($credits))
04736                 {
04737                   $credits = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($credits));
04738                 }
04739               }
04740               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit']))
04741               {
04742                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit'] as $credit)
04743                 {
04744                   $credit_role = null;
04745                   $credit_scheme = null;
04746                   $credit_name = null;
04747                   if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
04748                   {
04749                     $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04750                   }
04751                   if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04752                   {
04753                     $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04754                   }
04755                   else
04756                   {
04757                     $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
04758                   }
04759                   if (isset($credit['data']))
04760                   {
04761                     $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04762                   }
04763                   $credits[] = new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
04764                 }
04765                 if (is_array($credits))
04766                 {
04767                   $credits = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($credits));
04768                 }
04769               }
04770               else
04771               {
04772                 $credits = $credits_parent;
04773               }
04774 
04775               // DESCRIPTION
04776               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description']))
04777               {
04778                 $description = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04779               }
04780               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description']))
04781               {
04782                 $description = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04783               }
04784               else
04785               {
04786                 $description = $description_parent;
04787               }
04788 
04789               // HASHES
04790               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash']))
04791               {
04792                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash'] as $hash)
04793                 {
04794                   $value = null;
04795                   $algo = null;
04796                   if (isset($hash['data']))
04797                   {
04798                     $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04799                   }
04800                   if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
04801                   {
04802                     $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04803                   }
04804                   else
04805                   {
04806                     $algo = 'md5';
04807                   }
04808                   $hashes[] = $algo.':'.$value;
04809                 }
04810                 if (is_array($hashes))
04811                 {
04812                   $hashes = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($hashes));
04813                 }
04814               }
04815               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash']))
04816               {
04817                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash'] as $hash)
04818                 {
04819                   $value = null;
04820                   $algo = null;
04821                   if (isset($hash['data']))
04822                   {
04823                     $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04824                   }
04825                   if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
04826                   {
04827                     $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04828                   }
04829                   else
04830                   {
04831                     $algo = 'md5';
04832                   }
04833                   $hashes[] = $algo.':'.$value;
04834                 }
04835                 if (is_array($hashes))
04836                 {
04837                   $hashes = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($hashes));
04838                 }
04839               }
04840               else
04841               {
04842                 $hashes = $hashes_parent;
04843               }
04844 
04845               // KEYWORDS
04846               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords']))
04847               {
04848                 if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data']))
04849                 {
04850                   $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04851                   foreach ($temp as $word)
04852                   {
04853                     $keywords[] = trim($word);
04854                   }
04855                   unset($temp);
04856                 }
04857                 if (is_array($keywords))
04858                 {
04859                   $keywords = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($keywords));
04860                 }
04861               }
04862               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords']))
04863               {
04864                 if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data']))
04865                 {
04866                   $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04867                   foreach ($temp as $word)
04868                   {
04869                     $keywords[] = trim($word);
04870                   }
04871                   unset($temp);
04872                 }
04873                 if (is_array($keywords))
04874                 {
04875                   $keywords = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($keywords));
04876                 }
04877               }
04878               else
04879               {
04880                 $keywords = $keywords_parent;
04881               }
04882 
04883               // PLAYER
04884               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
04885               {
04886                 $player = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04887               }
04888               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
04889               {
04890                 $player = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04891               }
04892               else
04893               {
04894                 $player = $player_parent;
04895               }
04896 
04897               // RATINGS
04898               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating']))
04899               {
04900                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating'] as $rating)
04901                 {
04902                   $rating_scheme = null;
04903                   $rating_value = null;
04904                   if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04905                   {
04906                     $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04907                   }
04908                   else
04909                   {
04910                     $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
04911                   }
04912                   if (isset($rating['data']))
04913                   {
04914                     $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04915                   }
04916                   $ratings[] = new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04917                 }
04918                 if (is_array($ratings))
04919                 {
04920                   $ratings = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($ratings));
04921                 }
04922               }
04923               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating']))
04924               {
04925                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating'] as $rating)
04926                 {
04927                   $rating_scheme = null;
04928                   $rating_value = null;
04929                   if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04930                   {
04931                     $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04932                   }
04933                   else
04934                   {
04935                     $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
04936                   }
04937                   if (isset($rating['data']))
04938                   {
04939                     $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04940                   }
04941                   $ratings[] = new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04942                 }
04943                 if (is_array($ratings))
04944                 {
04945                   $ratings = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($ratings));
04946                 }
04947               }
04948               else
04949               {
04950                 $ratings = $ratings_parent;
04951               }
04952 
04953               // RESTRICTIONS
04954               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction']))
04955               {
04956                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction'] as $restriction)
04957                 {
04958                   $restriction_relationship = null;
04959                   $restriction_type = null;
04960                   $restriction_value = null;
04961                   if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
04962                   {
04963                     $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04964                   }
04965                   if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
04966                   {
04967                     $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04968                   }
04969                   if (isset($restriction['data']))
04970                   {
04971                     $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04972                   }
04973                   $restrictions[] = new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04974                 }
04975                 if (is_array($restrictions))
04976                 {
04977                   $restrictions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($restrictions));
04978                 }
04979               }
04980               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction']))
04981               {
04982                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction'] as $restriction)
04983                 {
04984                   $restriction_relationship = null;
04985                   $restriction_type = null;
04986                   $restriction_value = null;
04987                   if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
04988                   {
04989                     $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04990                   }
04991                   if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
04992                   {
04993                     $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04994                   }
04995                   if (isset($restriction['data']))
04996                   {
04997                     $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04998                   }
04999                   $restrictions[] = new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
05000                 }
05001                 if (is_array($restrictions))
05002                 {
05003                   $restrictions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($restrictions));
05004                 }
05005               }
05006               else
05007               {
05008                 $restrictions = $restrictions_parent;
05009               }
05010 
05011               // THUMBNAILS
05012               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail']))
05013               {
05014                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail'] as $thumbnail)
05015                 {
05016                   $thumbnails[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05017                 }
05018                 if (is_array($thumbnails))
05019                 {
05020                   $thumbnails = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($thumbnails));
05021                 }
05022               }
05023               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail']))
05024               {
05025                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail'] as $thumbnail)
05026                 {
05027                   $thumbnails[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05028                 }
05029                 if (is_array($thumbnails))
05030                 {
05031                   $thumbnails = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($thumbnails));
05032                 }
05033               }
05034               else
05035               {
05036                 $thumbnails = $thumbnails_parent;
05037               }
05038 
05039               // TITLES
05040               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title']))
05041               {
05042                 $title = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05043               }
05044               elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title']))
05045               {
05046                 $title = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05047               }
05048               else
05049               {
05050                 $title = $title_parent;
05051               }
05052 
05053               $this->data['enclosures'][] = new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions, $categories, $channels, $copyrights, $credits, $description, $duration, $expression, $framerate, $hashes, $height, $keywords, $lang, $medium, $player, $ratings, $restrictions, $samplingrate, $thumbnails, $title, $width);
05054             }
05055           }
05056         }
05057       }
05058 
05059       // If we have standalone media:content tags, loop through them.
05060       if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content']))
05061       {
05062         foreach ((array) $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content'] as $content)
05063         {
05064           if (isset($content['attribs']['']['url']) || isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
05065           {
05066             // Attributes
05067             $bitrate = null;
05068             $channels = null;
05069             $duration = null;
05070             $expression = null;
05071             $framerate = null;
05072             $height = null;
05073             $javascript = null;
05074             $lang = null;
05075             $length = null;
05076             $medium = null;
05077             $samplingrate = null;
05078             $type = null;
05079             $url = null;
05080             $width = null;
05081 
05082             // Elements
05083             $captions = null;
05084             $categories = null;
05085             $copyrights = null;
05086             $credits = null;
05087             $description = null;
05088             $hashes = null;
05089             $keywords = null;
05090             $player = null;
05091             $ratings = null;
05092             $restrictions = null;
05093             $thumbnails = null;
05094             $title = null;
05095 
05096             // Start checking the attributes of media:content
05097             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['bitrate']))
05098             {
05099               $bitrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['bitrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05100             }
05101             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['channels']))
05102             {
05103               $channels = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['channels'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05104             }
05105             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['duration']))
05106             {
05107               $duration = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['duration'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05108             }
05109             else
05110             {
05111               $duration = $duration_parent;
05112             }
05113             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['expression']))
05114             {
05115               $expression = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['expression'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05116             }
05117             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['framerate']))
05118             {
05119               $framerate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['framerate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05120             }
05121             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['height']))
05122             {
05123               $height = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['height'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05124             }
05125             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['lang']))
05126             {
05127               $lang = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05128             }
05129             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']))
05130             {
05131               $length = ceil($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']);
05132             }
05133             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['medium']))
05134             {
05135               $medium = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['medium'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05136             }
05137             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate']))
05138             {
05139               $samplingrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05140             }
05141             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['type']))
05142             {
05143               $type = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05144             }
05145             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['width']))
05146             {
05147               $width = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['width'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05148             }
05149             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['url']))
05150             {
05151               $url = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05152             }
05153             // Checking the other optional media: elements. Priority: media:content, media:group, item, channel
05154 
05155             // CAPTIONS
05156             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text']))
05157             {
05158               foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text'] as $caption)
05159               {
05160                 $caption_type = null;
05161                 $caption_lang = null;
05162                 $caption_startTime = null;
05163                 $caption_endTime = null;
05164                 $caption_text = null;
05165                 if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
05166                 {
05167                   $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05168                 }
05169                 if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
05170                 {
05171                   $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05172                 }
05173                 if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
05174                 {
05175                   $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05176                 }
05177                 if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
05178                 {
05179                   $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05180                 }
05181                 if (isset($caption['data']))
05182                 {
05183                   $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05184                 }
05185                 $captions[] = new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
05186               }
05187               if (is_array($captions))
05188               {
05189                 $captions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($captions));
05190               }
05191             }
05192             else
05193             {
05194               $captions = $captions_parent;
05195             }
05196 
05197             // CATEGORIES
05198             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category']))
05199             {
05200               foreach ((array) $content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category'] as $category)
05201               {
05202                 $term = null;
05203                 $scheme = null;
05204                 $label = null;
05205                 if (isset($category['data']))
05206                 {
05207                   $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05208                 }
05209                 if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
05210                 {
05211                   $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05212                 }
05213                 else
05214                 {
05215                   $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
05216                 }
