05217                 if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
05218                 {
05219                   $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05220                 }
05221                 $categories[] = new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
05222               }
05223             }
05224             if (is_array($categories) && is_array($categories_parent))
05225             {
05226               $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique(array_merge($categories, $categories_parent)));
05227             }
05228             elseif (is_array($categories))
05229             {
05230               $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories));
05231             }
05232             elseif (is_array($categories_parent))
05233             {
05234               $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories_parent));
05235             }
05236             else
05237             {
05238               $categories = null;
05239             }
05240 
05241             // COPYRIGHTS
05242             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright']))
05243             {
05244               $copyright_url = null;
05245               $copyright_label = null;
05246               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url']))
05247               {
05248                 $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05249               }
05250               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data']))
05251               {
05252                 $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05253               }
05254               $copyrights = new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
05255             }
05256             else
05257             {
05258               $copyrights = $copyrights_parent;
05259             }
05260 
05261             // CREDITS
05262             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit']))
05263             {
05264               foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit'] as $credit)
05265               {
05266                 $credit_role = null;
05267                 $credit_scheme = null;
05268                 $credit_name = null;
05269                 if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
05270                 {
05271                   $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05272                 }
05273                 if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
05274                 {
05275                   $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05276                 }
05277                 else
05278                 {
05279                   $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
05280                 }
05281                 if (isset($credit['data']))
05282                 {
05283                   $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05284                 }
05285                 $credits[] = new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
05286               }
05287               if (is_array($credits))
05288               {
05289                 $credits = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($credits));
05290               }
05291             }
05292             else
05293             {
05294               $credits = $credits_parent;
05295             }
05296 
05297             // DESCRIPTION
05298             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description']))
05299             {
05300               $description = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05301             }
05302             else
05303             {
05304               $description = $description_parent;
05305             }
05306 
05307             // HASHES
05308             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash']))
05309             {
05310               foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash'] as $hash)
05311               {
05312                 $value = null;
05313                 $algo = null;
05314                 if (isset($hash['data']))
05315                 {
05316                   $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05317                 }
05318                 if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
05319                 {
05320                   $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05321                 }
05322                 else
05323                 {
05324                   $algo = 'md5';
05325                 }
05326                 $hashes[] = $algo.':'.$value;
05327               }
05328               if (is_array($hashes))
05329               {
05330                 $hashes = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($hashes));
05331               }
05332             }
05333             else
05334             {
05335               $hashes = $hashes_parent;
05336             }
05337 
05338             // KEYWORDS
05339             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords']))
05340             {
05341               if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data']))
05342               {
05343                 $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
05344                 foreach ($temp as $word)
05345                 {
05346                   $keywords[] = trim($word);
05347                 }
05348                 unset($temp);
05349               }
05350               if (is_array($keywords))
05351               {
05352                 $keywords = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($keywords));
05353               }
05354             }
05355             else
05356             {
05357               $keywords = $keywords_parent;
05358             }
05359 
05360             // PLAYER
05361             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
05362             {
05363               $player = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05364             }
05365             else
05366             {
05367               $player = $player_parent;
05368             }
05369 
05370             // RATINGS
05371             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating']))
05372             {
05373               foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating'] as $rating)
05374               {
05375                 $rating_scheme = null;
05376                 $rating_value = null;
05377                 if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
05378                 {
05379                   $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05380                 }
05381                 else
05382                 {
05383                   $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
05384                 }
05385                 if (isset($rating['data']))
05386                 {
05387                   $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05388                 }
05389                 $ratings[] = new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
05390               }
05391               if (is_array($ratings))
05392               {
05393                 $ratings = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($ratings));
05394               }
05395             }
05396             else
05397             {
05398               $ratings = $ratings_parent;
05399             }
05400 
05401             // RESTRICTIONS
05402             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction']))
05403             {
05404               foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction'] as $restriction)
05405               {
05406                 $restriction_relationship = null;
05407                 $restriction_type = null;
05408                 $restriction_value = null;
05409                 if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
05410                 {
05411                   $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05412                 }
05413                 if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
05414                 {
05415                   $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05416                 }
05417                 if (isset($restriction['data']))
05418                 {
05419                   $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05420                 }
05421                 $restrictions[] = new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
05422               }
05423               if (is_array($restrictions))
05424               {
05425                 $restrictions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($restrictions));
05426               }
05427             }
05428             else
05429             {
05430               $restrictions = $restrictions_parent;
05431             }
05432 
05433             // THUMBNAILS
05434             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail']))
05435             {
05436               foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail'] as $thumbnail)
05437               {
05438                 $thumbnails[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05439               }
05440               if (is_array($thumbnails))
05441               {
05442                 $thumbnails = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($thumbnails));
05443               }
05444             }
05445             else
05446             {
05447               $thumbnails = $thumbnails_parent;
05448             }
05449 
05450             // TITLES
05451             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title']))
05452             {
05453               $title = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05454             }
05455             else
05456             {
05457               $title = $title_parent;
05458             }
05459 
05460             $this->data['enclosures'][] = new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions, $categories, $channels, $copyrights, $credits, $description, $duration, $expression, $framerate, $hashes, $height, $keywords, $lang, $medium, $player, $ratings, $restrictions, $samplingrate, $thumbnails, $title, $width);
05461           }
05462         }
05463       }
05464 
05465       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link') as $link)
05466       {
05467         if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']) && !empty($link['attribs']['']['rel']) && $link['attribs']['']['rel'] === 'enclosure')
05468         {
05469           // Attributes
05470           $bitrate = null;
05471           $channels = null;
05472           $duration = null;
05473           $expression = null;
05474           $framerate = null;
05475           $height = null;
05476           $javascript = null;
05477           $lang = null;
05478           $length = null;
05479           $medium = null;
05480           $samplingrate = null;
05481           $type = null;
05482           $url = null;
05483           $width = null;
05484 
05485           $url = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
05486           if (isset($link['attribs']['']['type']))
05487           {
05488             $type = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05489           }
05490           if (isset($link['attribs']['']['length']))
05491           {
05492             $length = ceil($link['attribs']['']['length']);
05493           }
05494 
05495           // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
05496           $this->data['enclosures'][] = new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width);
05497         }
05498       }
05499 
05500       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link') as $link)
05501       {
05502         if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']) && !empty($link['attribs']['']['rel']) && $link['attribs']['']['rel'] === 'enclosure')
05503         {
05504           // Attributes
05505           $bitrate = null;
05506           $channels = null;
05507           $duration = null;
05508           $expression = null;
05509           $framerate = null;
05510           $height = null;
05511           $javascript = null;
05512           $lang = null;
05513           $length = null;
05514           $medium = null;
05515           $samplingrate = null;
05516           $type = null;
05517           $url = null;
05518           $width = null;
05519 
05520           $url = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
05521           if (isset($link['attribs']['']['type']))
05522           {
05523             $type = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05524           }
05525           if (isset($link['attribs']['']['length']))
05526           {
05527             $length = ceil($link['attribs']['']['length']);
05528           }
05529 
05530           // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
05531           $this->data['enclosures'][] = new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width);
05532         }
05533       }
05534 
05535       if ($enclosure = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'enclosure'))
05536       {
05537         if (isset($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
05538         {
05539           // Attributes
05540           $bitrate = null;
05541           $channels = null;
05542           $duration = null;
05543           $expression = null;
05544           $framerate = null;
05545           $height = null;
05546           $javascript = null;
05547           $lang = null;
05548           $length = null;
05549           $medium = null;
05550           $samplingrate = null;
05551           $type = null;
05552           $url = null;
05553           $width = null;
05554 
05555           $url = $this->sanitize($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($enclosure[0]));
05556           if (isset($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['type']))
05557           {
05558             $type = $this->sanitize($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05559           }
05560           if (isset($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['length']))
05561           {
05562             $length = ceil($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['length']);
05563           }
05564 
05565           // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
05566           $this->data['enclosures'][] = new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width);
05567         }
05568       }
05569 
05570       if (sizeof($this->data['enclosures']) === 0 && ($url || $type || $length || $bitrate || $captions_parent || $categories_parent || $channels || $copyrights_parent || $credits_parent || $description_parent || $duration_parent || $expression || $framerate || $hashes_parent || $height || $keywords_parent || $lang || $medium || $player_parent || $ratings_parent || $restrictions_parent || $samplingrate || $thumbnails_parent || $title_parent || $width))
05571       {
05572         // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
05573         $this->data['enclosures'][] = new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width);
05574       }
05575 
05576       $this->data['enclosures'] = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($this->data['enclosures']));
05577     }
05578     if (!empty($this->data['enclosures']))
05579     {
05580       return $this->data['enclosures'];
05581     }
05582     else
05583     {
05584       return null;
05585     }
05586   }
05587 
05588   function get_latitude()
05589   {
05590     if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lat'))
05591     {
05592       return (float) $return[0]['data'];
05593     }
05594     elseif (($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
05595     {
05596       return (float) $match[1];
05597     }
05598     else
05599     {
05600       return null;
05601     }
05602   }
05603 
05604   function get_longitude()
05605   {
05606     if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'long'))
05607     {
05608       return (float) $return[0]['data'];
05609     }
05610     elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lon'))
05611     {
05612       return (float) $return[0]['data'];
05613     }
05614     elseif (($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
05615     {
05616       return (float) $match[2];
05617     }
05618     else
05619     {
05620       return null;
05621     }
05622   }
05623 
05624   function get_source()
05625   {
05626     if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'source'))
05627     {
05628       return new $this->feed->source_class($this, $return[0]);
05629     }
05630     else
05631     {
05632       return null;
05633     }
05634   }
05635 
05645   function add_to_service($item_url, $title_url = null, $summary_url = null)
05646   {
05647     if ($this->get_permalink() !== null)
05648     {
05649       $return = $item_url . rawurlencode($this->get_permalink());
05650       if ($title_url !== null && $this->get_title() !== null)
05651       {
05652         $return .= $title_url . rawurlencode($this->get_title());
05653       }
05654       if ($summary_url !== null && $this->get_description() !== null)
05655       {
05656         $return .= $summary_url . rawurlencode($this->get_description());
05657       }
05658       return $this->sanitize($return, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05659     }
05660     else
05661     {
05662       return null;
05663     }
05664   }
05665 
05666   function add_to_blinklist()
05667   {
05668     return $this->add_to_service('http://www.blinklist.com/index.php?Action=Blink/addblink.php&Description=&Url=', '&Title=');
05669   }
05670 
05671   function add_to_blogmarks()
05672   {
05673     return $this->add_to_service('http://blogmarks.net/my/new.php?mini=1&simple=1&url=', '&title=');
05674   }
05675 
05676   function add_to_delicious()
05677   {
05678     return $this->add_to_service('http://del.icio.us/post/?v=4&url=', '&title=');
05679   }
05680 
05681   function add_to_digg()
05682   {
05683     return $this->add_to_service('http://digg.com/submit?url=', '&title=', '&bodytext=');
05684   }
05685 
05686   function add_to_furl()
05687   {
05688     return $this->add_to_service('http://www.furl.net/storeIt.jsp?u=', '&t=');
05689   }
05690 
05691   function add_to_magnolia()
05692   {
05693     return $this->add_to_service('http://ma.gnolia.com/bookmarklet/add?url=', '&title=');
05694   }
05695 
05696   function add_to_myweb20()
05697   {
05698     return $this->add_to_service('http://myweb2.search.yahoo.com/myresults/bookmarklet?u=', '&t=');
05699   }
05700 
05701   function add_to_newsvine()
05702   {
05703     return $this->add_to_service('http://www.newsvine.com/_wine/save?u=', '&h=');
05704   }
05705 
05706   function add_to_reddit()
05707   {
05708     return $this->add_to_service('http://reddit.com/submit?url=', '&title=');
05709   }
05710 
05711   function add_to_segnalo()
05712   {
05713     return $this->add_to_service('http://segnalo.com/post.html.php?url=', '&title=');
05714   }
05715 
05716   function add_to_simpy()
05717   {
05718     return $this->add_to_service('http://www.simpy.com/simpy/LinkAdd.do?href=', '&title=');
05719   }
05720 
05721   function add_to_spurl()
05722   {
05723     return $this->add_to_service('http://www.spurl.net/spurl.php?v=3&url=', '&title=');
05724   }
05725 
05726   function add_to_wists()
05727   {
05728     return $this->add_to_service('http://wists.com/r.php?c=&r=', '&title=');
05729   }
05730 
05731   function search_technorati()
05732   {
05733     return $this->add_to_service('http://www.technorati.com/search/');
05734   }
05735 }
05736 
05737 class SimplePie_Source
05738 {
05739   var $item;
05740   var $data = array();
05741 
05742   function SimplePie_Source($item, $data)
05743   {
05744     $this->item = $item;
05745     $this->data = $data;
05746   }
05747 
05748   function __toString()
05749   {
05750     return md5(serialize($this->data));
05751   }
05752 
05753   function get_source_tags($namespace, $tag)
05754   {
05755     if (isset($this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
05756     {
05757       return $this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag];
05758     }
05759     else
05760     {
05761       return null;
05762     }
05763   }
05764 
05765   function get_base($element = array())
05766   {
05767     return $this->item->get_base($element);
05768   }
05769 
05770   function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
05771   {
05772     return $this->item->sanitize($data, $type, $base);
05773   }
05774 
05775   function get_item()
05776   {
05777     return $this->item;
05778   }
05779 
05780   function get_title()
05781   {
05782     if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'title'))
05783     {
05784       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
05785     }
05786     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'title'))
05787     {
05788       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
05789     }
05790     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
05791     {
05792       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
05793     }
05794     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
05795     {
05796       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
05797     }
05798     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
05799     {
05800       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
05801     }
05802     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
05803     {
05804       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05805     }
05806     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
05807     {
05808       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05809     }
05810     else
05811     {
05812       return null;
05813     }
05814   }
05815 
05816   function get_category($key = 0)
05817   {
05818     $categories = $this->get_categories();
05819     if (isset($categories[$key]))
05820     {
05821       return $categories[$key];
05822     }
05823     else
05824     {
05825       return null;
05826     }
05827   }
05828 
05829   function get_categories()
05830   {
05831     $categories = array();
05832 
05833     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'category') as $category)
05834     {
05835       $term = null;
05836       $scheme = null;
05837       $label = null;
05838       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['term']))
05839       {
05840         $term = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['term'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05841       }
05842       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
05843       {
05844         $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05845       }
05846       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
05847       {
05848         $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05849       }
05850       $categories[] = new $this->item->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
05851     }
05852     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'category') as $category)
05853     {
05854       // This is really the label, but keep this as the term also for BC.
05855       // Label will also work on retrieving because that falls back to term.
05856       $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05857       if (isset($category['attribs']['']['domain']))
05858       {
05859         $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['domain'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05860       }
05861       else
05862       {
05863         $scheme = null;
05864       }
05865       $categories[] = new $this->item->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, null);
05866     }
05867     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'subject') as $category)
05868     {
05869       $categories[] = new $this->item->feed->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05870     }
05871     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'subject') as $category)
05872     {
05873       $categories[] = new $this->item->feed->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05874     }
05875 
05876     if (!empty($categories))
05877     {
05878       return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories);
05879     }
05880     else
05881     {
05882       return null;
05883     }
05884   }
05885 
05886   function get_author($key = 0)
05887   {
05888     $authors = $this->get_authors();
05889     if (isset($authors[$key]))
05890     {
05891       return $authors[$key];
05892     }
05893     else
05894     {
05895       return null;
05896     }
05897   }
05898 
05899   function get_authors()
05900   {
05901     $authors = array();
05902     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'author') as $author)
05903     {
05904       $name = null;
05905       $uri = null;
05906       $email = null;
05907       if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
05908       {
05909         $name = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05910       }
05911       if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
05912       {
05913         $uri = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
05914       }
05915       if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
05916       {
05917         $email = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05918       }
05919       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
05920       {
05921         $authors[] = new $this->item->feed->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
05922       }
05923     }
05924     if ($author = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'author'))
05925     {
05926       $name = null;
05927       $url = null;
05928       $email = null;
05929       if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
05930       {
05931         $name = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05932       }
05933       if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
05934       {
05935         $url = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
05936       }
05937       if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
05938       {
05939         $email = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05940       }
05941       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
05942       {
05943         $authors[] = new $this->item->feed->author_class($name, $url, $email);
05944       }
05945     }
05946     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'creator') as $author)
05947     {
05948       $authors[] = new $this->item->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05949     }
05950     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'creator') as $author)
05951     {
05952       $authors[] = new $this->item->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05953     }
05954     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'author') as $author)
05955     {
05956       $authors[] = new $this->item->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05957     }
05958 
05959     if (!empty($authors))
05960     {
05961       return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($authors);
05962     }
05963     else
05964     {
05965       return null;
05966     }
05967   }
05968 
05969   function get_contributor($key = 0)
05970   {
05971     $contributors = $this->get_contributors();
05972     if (isset($contributors[$key]))
05973     {
05974       return $contributors[$key];
05975     }
05976     else
05977     {
05978       return null;
05979     }
05980   }
05981 
05982   function get_contributors()
05983   {
05984     $contributors = array();
05985     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'contributor') as $contributor)
05986     {
05987       $name = null;
05988       $uri = null;
05989       $email = null;
05990       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
05991       {
05992         $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05993       }
05994       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
05995       {
05996         $uri = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
05997       }
05998       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
05999       {
06000         $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06001       }
06002       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
06003       {
06004         $contributors[] = new $this->item->feed->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
06005       }
06006     }
06007     foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'contributor') as $contributor)
06008     {
06009       $name = null;
06010       $url = null;
06011       $email = null;
06012       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
06013       {
06014         $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06015       }
06016       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
06017       {
06018         $url = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
06019       }
06020       if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
06021       {
06022         $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06023       }
06024       if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
06025       {
06026         $contributors[] = new $this->item->feed->author_class($name, $url, $email);
06027       }
06028     }
06029 
06030     if (!empty($contributors))
06031     {
06032       return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($contributors);
06033     }
06034     else
06035     {
06036       return null;
06037     }
06038   }
06039 
06040   function get_link($key = 0, $rel = 'alternate')
06041   {
06042     $links = $this->get_links($rel);
06043     if (isset($links[$key]))
06044     {
06045       return $links[$key];
06046     }
06047     else
06048     {
06049       return null;
06050     }
06051   }
06052 
06056   function get_permalink()
06057   {
06058     return $this->get_link(0);
06059   }
06060 
06061   function get_links($rel = 'alternate')
06062   {
06063     if (!isset($this->data['links']))
06064     {
06065       $this->data['links'] = array();
06066       if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link'))
06067       {
06068         foreach ($links as $link)
06069         {
06070           if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
06071           {
06072             $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
06073             $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
06074           }
06075         }
06076       }
06077       if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link'))
06078       {
06079         foreach ($links as $link)
06080         {
06081           if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
06082           {
06083             $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
06084             $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
06085 
06086           }
06087         }
06088       }
06089       if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
06090       {
06091         $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
06092       }
06093       if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
06094       {
06095         $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
06096       }
06097       if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
06098       {
06099         $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
06100       }
06101 
06102       $keys = array_keys($this->data['links']);
06103       foreach ($keys as $key)
06104       {
06105         if (SimplePie_Misc::is_isegment_nz_nc($key))
06106         {
06107           if (isset($this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]))
06108           {
06109             $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] = array_merge($this->data['links'][$key], $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]);
06110             $this->data['links'][$key] =& $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key];
06111           }
06112           else
06113           {
06114             $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
06115           }
06116         }
06117         elseif (substr($key, 0, 41) === SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY)
06118         {
06119           $this->data['links'][substr($key, 41)] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
06120         }
06121         $this->data['links'][$key] = array_unique($this->data['links'][$key]);
06122       }
06123     }
06124 
06125     if (isset($this->data['links'][$rel]))
06126     {
06127       return $this->data['links'][$rel];
06128     }
06129     else
06130     {
06131       return null;
06132     }
06133   }
06134 
06135   function get_description()
06136   {
06137     if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'subtitle'))
06138     {
06139       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
06140     }
06141     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'tagline'))
06142     {
06143       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
06144     }
06145     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'description'))
06146     {
06147       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06148     }
06149     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'description'))
06150     {
06151       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06152     }
06153     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'description'))
06154     {
06155       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06156     }
06157     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'description'))
06158     {
06159       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06160     }
06161     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'description'))
06162     {
06163       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06164     }
06165     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'summary'))
06166     {
06167       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06168     }
06169     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'subtitle'))
06170     {
06171       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06172     }
06173     else
06174     {
06175       return null;
06176     }
06177   }
06178 
06179   function get_copyright()
06180   {
06181     if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'rights'))
06182     {
06183       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
06184     }
06185     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'copyright'))
06186     {
06187       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
06188     }
06189     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'copyright'))
06190     {
06191       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06192     }
06193     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'rights'))
06194     {
06195       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06196     }
06197     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'rights'))
06198     {
06199       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06200     }
06201     else
06202     {
06203       return null;
06204     }
06205   }
06206 
06207   function get_language()
06208   {
06209     if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'language'))
06210     {
06211       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06212     }
06213     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'language'))
06214     {
06215       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06216     }
06217     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'language'))
06218     {
06219       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06220     }
06221     elseif (isset($this->data['xml_lang']))
06222     {
06223       return $this->sanitize($this->data['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06224     }
06225     else
06226     {
06227       return null;
06228     }
06229   }
06230 
06231   function get_latitude()
06232   {
06233     if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lat'))
06234     {
06235       return (float) $return[0]['data'];
06236     }
06237     elseif (($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
06238     {
06239       return (float) $match[1];
06240     }
06241     else
06242     {
06243       return null;
06244     }
06245   }
06246 
06247   function get_longitude()
06248   {
06249     if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'long'))
06250     {
06251       return (float) $return[0]['data'];
06252     }
06253     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lon'))
06254     {
06255       return (float) $return[0]['data'];
06256     }
06257     elseif (($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
06258     {
06259       return (float) $match[2];
06260     }
06261     else
06262     {
06263       return null;
06264     }
06265   }
06266 
06267   function get_image_url()
06268   {
06269     if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'image'))
06270     {
06271       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
06272     }
06273     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'logo'))
06274     {
06275       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06276     }
06277     elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'icon'))
06278     {
06279       return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06280     }
06281     else
06282     {
06283       return null;
06284     }
06285   }
06286 }
06287 
06288 class SimplePie_Author
06289 {
06290   var $name;
06291   var $link;
06292   var $email;
06293 
06294   // Constructor, used to input the data
06295   function SimplePie_Author($name = null, $link = null, $email = null)
06296   {
06297     $this->name = $name;
06298     $this->link = $link;
06299     $this->email = $email;
06300   }
06301 
06302   function __toString()
06303   {
06304     // There is no $this->data here
06305     return md5(serialize($this));
06306   }
06307 
06308   function get_name()
06309   {
06310     if ($this->name !== null)
06311     {
06312       return $this->name;
06313     }
06314     else
06315     {
06316       return null;
06317     }
06318   }
06319 
06320   function get_link()
06321   {
06322     if ($this->link !== null)
06323     {
06324       return $this->link;
06325     }
06326     else
06327     {
06328       return null;
06329     }
06330   }
06331 
06332   function get_email()
06333   {
06334     if ($this->email !== null)
06335     {
06336       return $this->email;
06337     }
06338     else
06339     {
06340       return null;
06341     }
06342   }
06343 }
06344 
06345 class SimplePie_Category
06346 {
06347   var $term;
06348   var $scheme;
06349   var $label;
06350 
06351   // Constructor, used to input the data
06352   function SimplePie_Category($term = null, $scheme = null, $label = null)
06353   {
06354     $this->term = $term;
06355     $this->scheme = $scheme;
06356     $this->label = $label;
06357   }
06358 
06359   function __toString()
06360   {
06361     // There is no $this->data here
06362     return md5(serialize($this));
06363   }
06364 
06365   function get_term()
06366   {
06367     if ($this->term !== null)
06368     {
06369       return $this->term;
06370     }
06371     else
06372     {
06373       return null;
06374     }
06375   }
06376 
06377   function get_scheme()
06378   {
06379     if ($this->scheme !== null)
06380     {
06381       return $this->scheme;
06382     }
06383     else
06384     {
06385       return null;
06386     }
06387   }
06388 
06389   function get_label()
06390   {
06391     if ($this->label !== null)
06392     {
06393       return $this->label;
06394     }
06395     else
06396     {
06397       return $this->get_term();
06398     }
06399   }
06400 }
06401 
06402 class SimplePie_Enclosure
06403 {
06404   var $bitrate;
06405   var $captions;
06406   var $categories;
06407   var $channels;
06408   var $copyright;
06409   var $credits;
06410   var $description;
06411   var $duration;
06412   var $expression;
06413   var $framerate;
06414   var $handler;
06415   var $hashes;
06416   var $height;
06417   var $javascript;
06418   var $keywords;
06419   var $lang;
06420   var $length;
06421   var $link;
06422   var $medium;
06423   var $player;
06424   var $ratings;
06425   var $restrictions;
06426   var $samplingrate;
06427   var $thumbnails;
06428   var $title;
06429   var $type;
06430   var $width;
06431 
06432   // Constructor, used to input the data
06433   function SimplePie_Enclosure($link = null, $type = null, $length = null, $javascript = null, $bitrate = null, $captions = null, $categories = null, $channels = null, $copyright = null, $credits = null, $description = null, $duration = null, $expression = null, $framerate = null, $hashes = null, $height = null, $keywords = null, $lang = null, $medium = null, $player = null, $ratings = null, $restrictions = null, $samplingrate = null, $thumbnails = null, $title = null, $width = null)
06434   {
06435     $this->bitrate = $bitrate;
06436     $this->captions = $captions;
06437     $this->categories = $categories;
06438     $this->channels = $channels;
06439     $this->copyright = $copyright;
06440     $this->credits = $credits;
06441     $this->description = $description;
06442     $this->duration = $duration;
06443     $this->expression = $expression;
06444     $this->framerate = $framerate;
06445     $this->hashes = $hashes;
06446     $this->height = $height;
06447     $this->javascript = $javascript;
06448     $this->keywords = $keywords;
06449     $this->lang = $lang;
06450     $this->length = $length;
06451     $this->link = $link;
06452     $this->medium = $medium;
06453     $this->player = $player;
06454     $this->ratings = $ratings;
06455     $this->restrictions = $restrictions;
06456     $this->samplingrate = $samplingrate;
06457     $this->thumbnails = $thumbnails;
06458     $this->title = $title;
06459     $this->type = $type;
06460     $this->width = $width;
06461     if (class_exists('idna_convert'))
06462     {
06463       $idn = new idna_convert;
06464       $parsed = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($link);
06465       $this->link = SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url($parsed['scheme'], $idn->encode($parsed['authority']), $parsed['path'], $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']);
06466     }
06467     $this->handler = $this->get_handler(); // Needs to load last
06468   }
06469 
06470   function __toString()
06471   {
06472     // There is no $this->data here
06473     return md5(serialize($this));
06474   }
06475 
06476   function get_bitrate()
06477   {
06478     if ($this->bitrate !== null)
06479     {
06480       return $this->bitrate;
06481     }
06482     else
06483     {
06484       return null;
06485     }
06486   }
06487 
06488   function get_caption($key = 0)
06489   {
06490     $captions = $this->get_captions();
06491     if (isset($captions[$key]))
06492     {
06493       return $captions[$key];
06494     }
06495     else
06496     {
06497       return null;
06498     }
06499   }
06500 
06501   function get_captions()
06502   {
06503     if ($this->captions !== null)
06504     {
06505       return $this->captions;
06506     }
06507     else
06508     {
06509       return null;
06510     }
06511   }
06512 
06513   function get_category($key = 0)
06514   {
06515     $categories = $this->get_categories();
06516     if (isset($categories[$key]))
06517     {
06518       return $categories[$key];
06519     }
06520     else
06521     {
06522       return null;
06523     }
06524   }
06525 
06526   function get_categories()
06527   {
06528     if ($this->categories !== null)
06529     {
06530       return $this->categories;
06531     }
06532     else
06533     {
06534       return null;
06535     }
06536   }
06537 
06538   function get_channels()
06539   {
06540     if ($this->channels !== null)
06541     {
06542       return $this->channels;
06543     }
06544     else
06545     {
06546       return null;
06547     }
06548   }
06549 
06550   function get_copyright()
06551   {
06552     if ($this->copyright !== null)
06553     {
06554       return $this->copyright;
06555     }
06556     else
06557     {
06558       return null;
06559     }
06560   }
06561 
06562   function get_credit($key = 0)
06563   {
06564     $credits = $this->get_credits();
06565     if (isset($credits[$key]))
06566     {
06567       return $credits[$key];
06568     }
06569     else
06570     {
06571       return null;
06572     }
06573   }
06574 
06575   function get_credits()
06576   {
06577     if ($this->credits !== null)
06578     {
06579       return $this->credits;
06580     }
06581     else
06582     {
06583       return null;
06584     }
06585   }
06586 
06587   function get_description()
06588   {
06589     if ($this->description !== null)
06590     {
06591       return $this->description;
06592     }
06593     else
06594     {
06595       return null;
06596     }
06597   }
06598 
06599   function get_duration($convert = false)
06600   {
06601     if ($this->duration !== null)
06602     {
06603       if ($convert)
06604       {
06605         $time = SimplePie_Misc::time_hms($this->duration);
06606         return $time;
06607       }
06608       else
06609       {
06610         return $this->duration;
06611       }
06612     }
06613     else
06614     {
06615       return null;
06616     }
06617   }
06618 
06619   function get_expression()
06620   {
06621     if ($this->expression !== null)
06622     {
06623       return $this->expression;
06624     }
06625     else
06626     {
06627       return 'full';
06628     }
06629   }
06630 
06631   function get_extension()
06632   {
06633     if ($this->link !== null)
06634     {
06635       $url = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($this->link);
06636       if ($url['path'] !== '')
06637       {
06638         return pathinfo($url['path'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION);
06639       }
06640     }
06641     return null;
06642   }
06643 
06644   function get_framerate()
06645   {
06646     if ($this->framerate !== null)
06647     {
06648       return $this->framerate;
06649     }
06650     else
06651     {
06652       return null;
06653     }
06654   }
06655 
06656   function get_handler()
06657   {
06658     return $this->get_real_type(true);
06659   }
06660 
06661   function get_hash($key = 0)
06662   {
06663     $hashes = $this->get_hashes();
06664     if (isset($hashes[$key]))
06665     {
06666       return $hashes[$key];
06667     }
06668     else
06669     {
06670       return null;
06671     }
06672   }
06673 
06674   function get_hashes()
06675   {
06676     if ($this->hashes !== null)
06677     {
06678       return $this->hashes;
06679     }
06680     else
06681     {
06682       return null;
06683     }
06684   }
06685 
06686   function get_height()
06687   {
06688     if ($this->height !== null)
06689     {
06690       return $this->height;
06691     }
06692     else
06693     {
06694       return null;
06695     }
06696   }
06697 
06698   function get_language()
06699   {
06700     if ($this->lang !== null)
06701     {
06702       return $this->lang;
06703     }
06704     else
06705     {
06706       return null;
06707     }
06708   }
06709 
06710   function get_keyword($key = 0)
06711   {
06712     $keywords = $this->get_keywords();
06713     if (isset($keywords[$key]))
06714     {
06715       return $keywords[$key];
06716     }
06717     else
06718     {
06719       return null;
06720     }
06721   }
06722 
06723   function get_keywords()
06724   {
06725     if ($this->keywords !== null)
06726     {
06727       return $this->keywords;
06728     }
06729     else
06730     {
06731       return null;
06732     }
06733   }
06734 
06735   function get_length()
06736   {
06737     if ($this->length !== null)
06738     {
06739       return $this->length;
06740     }
06741     else
06742     {
06743       return null;
06744     }
06745   }
06746 
06747   function get_link()
06748   {
06749     if ($this->link !== null)
06750     {
06751       return urldecode($this->link);
06752     }
06753     else
06754     {
06755       return null;
06756     }
06757   }
06758 
06759   function get_medium()
06760   {
06761     if ($this->medium !== null)
06762     {
06763       return $this->medium;
06764     }
06765     else
06766     {
06767       return null;
06768     }
06769   }
06770 
06771   function get_player()
06772   {
06773     if ($this->player !== null)
06774     {
06775       return $this->player;
06776     }
06777     else
06778     {
06779       return null;
06780     }
06781   }
06782 
06783   function get_rating($key = 0)
06784   {
06785     $ratings = $this->get_ratings();
06786     if (isset($ratings[$key]))
06787     {
06788       return $ratings[$key];
06789     }
06790     else
06791     {
06792       return null;
06793     }
06794   }
06795 
06796   function get_ratings()
06797   {
06798     if ($this->ratings !== null)
06799     {
06800       return $this->ratings;
06801     }
06802     else
06803     {
06804       return null;
06805     }
06806   }
06807 
06808   function get_restriction($key = 0)
06809   {
06810     $restrictions = $this->get_restrictions();
06811     if (isset($restrictions[$key]))
06812     {
06813       return $restrictions[$key];
06814     }
06815     else
06816     {
06817       return null;
06818     }
06819   }
06820 
06821   function get_restrictions()
06822   {
06823     if ($this->restrictions !== null)
06824     {
06825       return $this->restrictions;
06826     }
06827     else
06828     {
06829       return null;
06830     }
06831   }
06832 
06833   function get_sampling_rate()
06834   {
06835     if ($this->samplingrate !== null)
06836     {
06837       return $this->samplingrate;
06838     }
06839     else
06840     {
06841       return null;
06842     }
06843   }
06844 
06845   function get_size()
06846   {
06847     $length = $this->get_length();
06848     if ($length !== null)
06849     {
06850       return round($length/1048576, 2);
06851     }
06852     else
06853     {
06854       return null;
06855     }
06856   }
06857 
06858   function get_thumbnail($key = 0)
06859   {
06860     $thumbnails = $this->get_thumbnails();
06861     if (isset($thumbnails[$key]))
06862     {
06863       return $thumbnails[$key];
06864     }
06865     else
06866     {
06867       return null;
06868     }
06869   }
06870 
06871   function get_thumbnails()
06872   {
06873     if ($this->thumbnails !== null)
06874     {
06875       return $this->thumbnails;
06876     }
06877     else
06878     {
06879       return null;
06880     }
06881   }
06882 
06883   function get_title()
06884   {
06885     if ($this->title !== null)
06886     {
06887       return $this->title;
06888     }
06889     else
06890     {
06891       return null;
06892     }
06893   }
06894 
06895   function get_type()
06896   {
06897     if ($this->type !== null)
06898     {
06899       return $this->type;
06900     }
06901     else
06902     {
06903       return null;
06904     }
06905   }
06906 
06907   function get_width()
06908   {
06909     if ($this->width !== null)
06910     {
06911       return $this->width;
06912     }
06913     else
06914     {
06915       return null;
06916     }
06917   }
06918 
06919   function native_embed($options='')
06920   {
06921     return $this->embed($options, true);
06922   }
06923 
06927   function embed($options = '', $native = false)
06928   {
06929     // Set up defaults
06930     $audio = '';
06931     $video = '';
06932     $alt = '';
06933     $altclass = '';
06934     $loop = 'false';
06935     $width = 'auto';
06936     $height = 'auto';
06937     $bgcolor = '#ffffff';
06938     $mediaplayer = '';
06939     $widescreen = false;
06940     $handler = $this->get_handler();
06941     $type = $this->get_real_type();
06942 
06943     // Process options and reassign values as necessary
06944     if (is_array($options))
06945     {
06946       extract($options);
06947     }
06948     else
06949     {
06950       $options = explode(',', $options);
06951       foreach($options as $option)
06952       {
06953         $opt = explode(':', $option, 2);
06954         if (isset($opt[0], $opt[1]))
06955         {
06956           $opt[0] = trim($opt[0]);
06957           $opt[1] = trim($opt[1]);
06958           switch ($opt[0])
06959           {
06960             case 'audio':
06961               $audio = $opt[1];
06962               break;
06963 
06964             case 'video':
06965               $video = $opt[1];
06966               break;
06967 
06968             case 'alt':
06969               $alt = $opt[1];
06970               break;
06971 
06972             case 'altclass':
06973               $altclass = $opt[1];
06974               break;
06975 
06976             case 'loop':
06977               $loop = $opt[1];
06978               break;
06979 
06980             case 'width':
06981               $width = $opt[1];
06982               break;
06983 
06984             case 'height':
06985               $height = $opt[1];
06986               break;
06987 
06988             case 'bgcolor':
06989               $bgcolor = $opt[1];
06990               break;
06991 
06992             case 'mediaplayer':
06993               $mediaplayer = $opt[1];
06994               break;
06995 
06996             case 'widescreen':
06997               $widescreen = $opt[1];
06998               break;
06999           }
07000         }
07001       }
07002     }
07003 
07004     $mime = explode('/', $type, 2);
07005     $mime = $mime[0];
07006 
07007     // Process values for 'auto'
07008     if ($width === 'auto')
07009     {
07010       if ($mime === 'video')
07011       {
07012         if ($height === 'auto')
07013         {
07014           $width = 480;
07015         }
07016         elseif ($widescreen)
07017         {
07018           $width = round((intval($height)/9)*16);
07019         }
07020         else
07021         {
07022           $width = round((intval($height)/3)*4);
07023         }
07024       }
07025       else
07026       {
07027         $width = '100%';
07028       }
07029     }
07030 
07031     if ($height === 'auto')
07032     {
07033       if ($mime === 'audio')
07034       {
07035         $height = 0;
07036       }
07037       elseif ($mime === 'video')
07038       {
07039         if ($width === 'auto')
07040         {
07041           if ($widescreen)
07042           {
07043             $height = 270;
07044           }
07045           else
07046           {
07047             $height = 360;
07048           }
07049         }
07050         elseif ($widescreen)
07051         {
07052           $height = round((intval($width)/16)*9);
07053         }
07054         else
07055         {
07056           $height = round((intval($width)/4)*3);
07057         }
07058       }
07059       else
07060       {
07061         $height = 376;
07062       }
07063     }
07064     elseif ($mime === 'audio')
07065     {
07066       $height = 0;
07067     }
07068 
07069     // Set proper placeholder value
07070     if ($mime === 'audio')
07071     {
07072       $placeholder = $audio;
07073     }
07074     elseif ($mime === 'video')
07075     {
07076       $placeholder = $video;
07077     }
07078 
07079     $embed = '';
07080 
07081     // Make sure the JS library is included
07082     if (!$native)
07083     {
07084       static $javascript_outputted = null;
07085       if (!$javascript_outputted && $this->javascript)
07086       {
07087         $embed .= '<script type="text/javascript" src="?' . htmlspecialchars($this->javascript) . '"></script>';
07088         $javascript_outputted = true;
07089       }
07090     }
07091 
07092     // Odeo Feed MP3's
07093     if ($handler === 'odeo')
07094     {
07095       if ($native)
07096       {
07097         $embed .= '<embed src="http://odeo.com/flash/audio_player_fullsize.swf" pluginspage="http://adobe.com/go/getflashplayer" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" quality="high" width="440" height="80" wmode="transparent" allowScriptAccess="any" flashvars="valid_sample_rate=true&external_url=' . $this->get_link() . '"></embed>';
07098       }
07099       else
07100       {
07101         $embed .= '<script type="text/javascript">embed_odeo("' . $this->get_link() . '");</script>';
07102       }
07103     }
07104 
07105     // Flash
07106     elseif ($handler === 'flash')
07107     {
07108       if ($native)
07109       {
07110         $embed .= "<embed src=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" pluginspage=\"http://adobe.com/go/getflashplayer\" type=\"$type\" quality=\"high\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" bgcolor=\"$bgcolor\" loop=\"$loop\"></embed>";
07111       }
07112       else
07113       {
07114         $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_flash('$bgcolor', '$width', '$height', '" . $this->get_link() . "', '$loop', '$type');</script>";
07115       }
07116     }
07117 
07118     // Flash Media Player file types.
07119     // Preferred handler for MP3 file types.
07120     elseif ($handler === 'fmedia' || ($handler === 'mp3' && $mediaplayer !== ''))
07121     {
07122       $height += 20;
07123       if ($native)
07124       {
07125         $embed .= "<embed src=\"$mediaplayer\" pluginspage=\"http://adobe.com/go/getflashplayer\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" quality=\"high\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" wmode=\"transparent\" flashvars=\"file=" . rawurlencode($this->get_link().'?file_extension=.'.$this->get_extension()) . "&autostart=false&repeat=$loop&showdigits=true&showfsbutton=false\"></embed>";
07126       }
07127       else
07128       {
07129         $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_flv('$width', '$height', '" . rawurlencode($this->get_link().'?file_extension=.'.$this->get_extension()) . "', '$placeholder', '$loop', '$mediaplayer');</script>";
07130       }
07131     }
07132 
07133     // QuickTime 7 file types.  Need to test with QuickTime 6.
07134     // Only handle MP3's if the Flash Media Player is not present.
07135     elseif ($handler === 'quicktime' || ($handler === 'mp3' && $mediaplayer === ''))
07136     {
07137       $height += 16;
07138       if ($native)
07139       {
07140         if ($placeholder !== '')
07141         {
07142           $embed .= "<embed type=\"$type\" style=\"cursor:hand; cursor:pointer;\" href=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" src=\"$placeholder\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" autoplay=\"false\" target=\"myself\" controller=\"false\" loop=\"$loop\" scale=\"aspect\" bgcolor=\"$bgcolor\" pluginspage=\"http://apple.com/quicktime/download/\"></embed>";
07143         }
07144         else
07145         {
07146           $embed .= "<embed type=\"$type\" style=\"cursor:hand; cursor:pointer;\" src=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" autoplay=\"false\" target=\"myself\" controller=\"true\" loop=\"$loop\" scale=\"aspect\" bgcolor=\"$bgcolor\" pluginspage=\"http://apple.com/quicktime/download/\"></embed>";
07147         }
07148       }
07149       else
07150       {
07151         $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_quicktime('$type', '$bgcolor', '$width', '$height', '" . $this->get_link() . "', '$placeholder', '$loop');</script>";
07152       }
07153     }
07154 
07155     // Windows Media
07156     elseif ($handler === 'wmedia')
07157     {
07158       $height += 45;
07159       if ($native)
07160       {
07161         $embed .= "<embed type=\"application/x-mplayer2\" src=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" autosize=\"1\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" showcontrols=\"1\" showstatusbar=\"0\" showdisplay=\"0\" autostart=\"0\"></embed>";
07162       }
07163       else
07164       {
07165         $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_wmedia('$width', '$height', '" . $this->get_link() . "');</script>";
07166       }
07167     }
07168 
07169     // Everything else
07170     else $embed .= '<a href="' . $this->get_link() . '" class="' . $altclass . '">' . $alt . '</a>';
07171 
07172     return $embed;
07173   }
07174 
07175   function get_real_type($find_handler = false)
07176   {
07177     // If it's Odeo, let's get it out of the way.
07178     if (substr(strtolower($this->get_link()), 0, 15) === 'http://odeo.com')
07179     {
07180       return 'odeo';
07181     }
07182 
07183     // Mime-types by handler.
07184     $types_flash = array('application/x-shockwave-flash', 'application/futuresplash'); // Flash
07185     $types_fmedia = array('video/flv', 'video/x-flv','flv-application/octet-stream'); // Flash Media Player
07186     $types_quicktime = array('audio/3gpp', 'audio/3gpp2', 'audio/aac', 'audio/x-aac', 'audio/aiff', 'audio/x-aiff', 'audio/mid', 'audio/midi', 'audio/x-midi', 'audio/mp4', 'audio/m4a', 'audio/x-m4a', 'audio/wav', 'audio/x-wav', 'video/3gpp', 'video/3gpp2', 'video/m4v', 'video/x-m4v', 'video/mp4', 'video/mpeg', 'video/x-mpeg', 'video/quicktime', 'video/sd-video'); // QuickTime
07187     $types_wmedia = array('application/asx', 'application/x-mplayer2', 'audio/x-ms-wma', 'audio/x-ms-wax', 'video/x-ms-asf-plugin', 'video/x-ms-asf', 'video/x-ms-wm', 'video/x-ms-wmv', 'video/x-ms-wvx'); // Windows Media
07188     $types_mp3 = array('audio/mp3', 'audio/x-mp3', 'audio/mpeg', 'audio/x-mpeg'); // MP3
07189 
07190     if ($this->get_type() !== null)
07191     {
07192       $type = strtolower($this->type);
07193     }
07194     else
07195     {
07196       $type = null;
07197     }
07198 
07199     // If we encounter an unsupported mime-type, check the file extension and guess intelligently.
07200     if (!in_array($type, array_merge($types_flash, $types_fmedia, $types_quicktime, $types_wmedia, $types_mp3)))
07201     {
07202       switch (strtolower($this->get_extension()))
07203       {
07204         // Audio mime-types
07205         case 'aac':
07206         case 'adts':
07207           $type = 'audio/acc';
07208           break;
07209 
07210         case 'aif':
07211         case 'aifc':
07212         case 'aiff':
07213         case 'cdda':
07214           $type = 'audio/aiff';
07215           break;
07216 
07217         case 'bwf':
07218           $type = 'audio/wav';
07219           break;
07220 
07221         case 'kar':
07222         case 'mid':
07223         case 'midi':
07224         case 'smf':
07225           $type = 'audio/midi';
07226           break;
07227 
07228         case 'm4a':
07229           $type = 'audio/x-m4a';
07230           break;
07231 
07232         case 'mp3':
07233         case 'swa':
07234           $type = 'audio/mp3';
07235           break;
07236 
07237         case 'wav':
07238           $type = 'audio/wav';
07239           break;
07240 
07241         case 'wax':
07242           $type = 'audio/x-ms-wax';
07243           break;
07244 
07245         case 'wma':
07246           $type = 'audio/x-ms-wma';
07247           break;
07248 
07249         // Video mime-types
07250         case '3gp':
07251         case '3gpp':
07252           $type = 'video/3gpp';
07253           break;
07254 
07255         case '3g2':
07256         case '3gp2':
07257           $type = 'video/3gpp2';
07258           break;
07259 
07260         case 'asf':
07261           $type = 'video/x-ms-asf';
07262           break;
07263 
07264         case 'flv':
07265           $type = 'video/x-flv';
07266           break;
07267 
07268         case 'm1a':
07269         case 'm1s':
07270         case 'm1v':
07271         case 'm15':
07272         case 'm75':
07273         case 'mp2':
07274         case 'mpa':
07275         case 'mpeg':
07276         case 'mpg':
07277         case 'mpm':
07278         case 'mpv':
07279           $type = 'video/mpeg';
07280           break;
07281 
07282         case 'm4v':
07283           $type = 'video/x-m4v';
07284           break;
07285 
07286         case 'mov':
07287         case 'qt':
07288           $type = 'video/quicktime';
07289           break;
07290 
07291         case 'mp4':
07292         case 'mpg4':
07293           $type = 'video/mp4';
07294           break;
07295 
07296         case 'sdv':
07297           $type = 'video/sd-video';
07298           break;
07299 
07300         case 'wm':
07301           $type = 'video/x-ms-wm';
07302           break;
07303 
07304         case 'wmv':
07305           $type = 'video/x-ms-wmv';
07306           break;
07307 
07308         case 'wvx':
07309           $type = 'video/x-ms-wvx';
07310           break;
07311 
07312         // Flash mime-types
07313         case 'spl':
07314           $type = 'application/futuresplash';
07315           break;
07316 
07317         case 'swf':
07318           $type = 'application/x-shockwave-flash';
07319           break;
07320       }
07321     }
07322 
07323     if ($find_handler)
07324     {
07325       if (in_array($type, $types_flash))
07326       {
07327         return 'flash';
07328       }
07329       elseif (in_array($type, $types_fmedia))
07330       {
07331         return 'fmedia';
07332       }
07333       elseif (in_array($type, $types_quicktime))
07334       {
07335         return 'quicktime';
07336       }
07337       elseif (in_array($type, $types_wmedia))
07338       {
07339         return 'wmedia';
07340       }
07341       elseif (in_array($type, $types_mp3))
07342       {
07343         return 'mp3';
07344       }
07345       else
07346       {
07347         return null;
07348       }
07349     }
07350     else
07351     {
07352       return $type;
07353     }
07354   }
07355 }
07356 
07357 class SimplePie_Caption
07358 {
07359   var $type;
07360   var $lang;
07361   var $startTime;
07362   var $endTime;
07363   var $text;
07364 
07365   // Constructor, used to input the data
07366   function SimplePie_Caption($type = null, $lang = null, $startTime = null, $endTime = null, $text = null)
07367   {
07368     $this->type = $type;
07369     $this->lang = $lang;
07370     $this->startTime = $startTime;
07371     $this->endTime = $endTime;
07372     $this->text = $text;
07373   }
07374 
07375   function __toString()
07376   {
07377     // There is no $this->data here
07378     return md5(serialize($this));
07379   }
07380 
07381   function get_endtime()
07382   {
07383     if ($this->endTime !== null)
07384     {
07385       return $this->endTime;
07386     }
07387     else
07388     {
07389       return null;
07390     }
07391   }
07392 
07393   function get_language()
07394   {
07395     if ($this->lang !== null)
07396     {
07397       return $this->lang;
07398     }
07399     else
07400     {
07401       return null;
07402     }
07403   }
07404 
07405   function get_starttime()
07406   {
07407     if ($this->startTime !== null)
07408     {
07409       return $this->startTime;
07410     }
07411     else
07412     {
07413       return null;
07414     }
07415   }
07416 
07417   function get_text()
07418   {
07419     if ($this->text !== null)
07420     {
07421       return $this->text;
07422     }
07423     else
07424     {
07425       return null;
07426     }
07427   }
07428 
07429   function get_type()
07430   {
07431     if ($this->type !== null)
07432     {
07433       return $this->type;
07434     }
07435     else
07436     {
07437       return null;
07438     }
07439   }
07440 }
07441 
07442 class SimplePie_Credit
07443 {
07444   var $role;
07445   var $scheme;
07446   var $name;
07447 
07448   // Constructor, used to input the data
07449   function SimplePie_Credit($role = null, $scheme = null, $name = null)
07450   {
07451     $this->role = $role;
07452     $this->scheme = $scheme;
07453     $this->name = $name;
07454   }
07455 
07456   function __toString()
07457   {
07458     // There is no $this->data here
07459     return md5(serialize($this));
07460   }
07461 
07462   function get_role()
07463   {
07464     if ($this->role !== null)
07465     {
07466       return $this->role;
07467     }
07468     else
07469     {
07470       return null;
07471     }
07472   }
07473 
07474   function get_scheme()
07475   {
07476     if ($this->scheme !== null)
07477     {
07478       return $this->scheme;
07479     }
07480     else
07481     {
07482       return null;
07483     }
07484   }
07485 
07486   function get_name()
07487   {
07488     if ($this->name !== null)
07489     {
07490       return $this->name;
07491     }
07492     else
07493     {
07494       return null;
07495     }
07496   }
07497 }
07498 
07499 class SimplePie_Copyright
07500 {
07501   var $url;
07502   var $label;
07503 
07504   // Constructor, used to input the data
07505   function SimplePie_Copyright($url = null, $label = null)
07506   {
07507     $this->url = $url;
07508     $this->label = $label;
07509   }
07510 
07511   function __toString()
07512   {
07513     // There is no $this->data here
07514     return md5(serialize($this));
07515   }
07516 
07517   function get_url()
07518   {
07519     if ($this->url !== null)
07520     {
07521       return $this->url;
07522     }
07523     else
07524     {
07525       return null;
07526     }
07527   }
07528 
07529   function get_attribution()
07530   {
07531     if ($this->label !== null)
07532     {
07533       return $this->label;
07534     }
07535     else
07536     {
07537       return null;
07538     }
07539   }
07540 }
07541 
07542 class SimplePie_Rating
07543 {
07544   var $scheme;
07545   var $value;
07546 
07547   // Constructor, used to input the data
07548   function SimplePie_Rating($scheme = null, $value = null)
07549   {
07550     $this->scheme = $scheme;
07551     $this->value = $value;
07552   }
07553 
07554   function __toString()
07555   {
07556     // There is no $this->data here
07557     return md5(serialize($this));
07558   }
07559 
07560   function get_scheme()
07561   {
07562     if ($this->scheme !== null)
07563     {
07564       return $this->scheme;
07565     }
07566     else
07567     {
07568       return null;
07569     }
07570   }
07571 
07572   function get_value()
07573   {
07574     if ($this->value !== null)
07575     {
07576       return $this->value;
07577     }
07578     else
07579     {
07580       return null;
07581     }
07582   }
07583 }
07584 
07585 class SimplePie_Restriction
07586 {
07587   var $relationship;
07588   var $type;
07589   var $value;
07590 
07591   // Constructor, used to input the data
07592   function SimplePie_Restriction($relationship = null, $type = null, $value = null)
07593   {
07594     $this->relationship = $relationship;
07595     $this->type = $type;
07596     $this->value = $value;
07597   }
07598 
07599   function __toString()
07600   {
07601     // There is no $this->data here
07602     return md5(serialize($this));
07603   }
07604 
07605   function get_relationship()
07606   {
07607     if ($this->relationship !== null)
07608     {
07609       return $this->relationship;
07610     }
07611     else
07612     {
07613       return null;
07614     }
07615   }
07616 
07617   function get_type()
07618   {
07619     if ($this->type !== null)
07620     {
07621       return $this->type;
07622     }
07623     else
07624     {
07625       return null;
07626     }
07627   }
07628 
07629   function get_value()
07630   {
07631     if ($this->value !== null)
07632     {
07633       return $this->value;
07634     }
07635     else
07636     {
07637       return null;
07638     }
07639   }
07640 }
07641 
07645 class SimplePie_File
07646 {
07647   var $url;
07648   var $useragent;
07649   var $success = true;
07650   var $headers = array();
07651   var $body;
07652   var $status_code;
07653   var $redirects = 0;
07654   var $error;
07655   var $method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_NONE;
07656 
07657   function SimplePie_File($url, $timeout = 10, $redirects = 5, $headers = null, $useragent = null, $force_fsockopen = false)
07658   {
07659     if (class_exists('idna_convert'))
07660     {
07661       $idn = new idna_convert;
07662       $parsed = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($url);
07663       $url = SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url($parsed['scheme'], $idn->encode($parsed['authority']), $parsed['path'], $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']);
07664     }
07665     $this->url = $url;
07666     $this->useragent = $useragent;
07667     if (preg_match('/^http(s)?:\/\//i', $url))
07668     {
07669       if ($useragent === null)
07670       {
07671         $useragent = ini_get('user_agent');
07672         $this->useragent = $useragent;
07673       }
07674       if (!is_array($headers))
07675       {
