07676         $headers = array();
07677       }
07678       if (!$force_fsockopen && function_exists('curl_exec'))
07679       {
07680         $this->method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE | SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_CURL;
07681         $fp = curl_init();
07682         $headers2 = array();
07683         foreach ($headers as $key => $value)
07684         {
07685           $headers2[] = "$key: $value";
07686         }
07687         if (version_compare(SimplePie_Misc::get_curl_version(), '7.10.5', '>='))
07688         {
07689           curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_ENCODING, '');
07690         }
07691         curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
07692         curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_HEADER, 1);
07693         curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
07694         curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);
07695         curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $timeout);
07696         curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_REFERER, $url);
07697         curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $useragent);
07698         curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers2);
07699         if (!ini_get('open_basedir') && !ini_get('safe_mode') && version_compare(SimplePie_Misc::get_curl_version(), '7.15.2', '>='))
07700         {
07701           curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
07702           curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, $redirects);
07703         }
07704 
07705         $this->headers = curl_exec($fp);
07706         if (curl_errno($fp) === 23 || curl_errno($fp) === 61)
07707         {
07708           curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_ENCODING, 'none');
07709           $this->headers = curl_exec($fp);
07710         }
07711         if (curl_errno($fp))
07712         {
07713           $this->error = 'cURL error ' . curl_errno($fp) . ': ' . curl_error($fp);
07714           $this->success = false;
07715         }
07716         else
07717         {
07718           $info = curl_getinfo($fp);
07719           curl_close($fp);
07720           $this->headers = explode("\r\n\r\n", $this->headers, $info['redirect_count'] + 1);
07721           $this->headers = array_pop($this->headers);
07722           $parser = new SimplePie_HTTP_Parser($this->headers);
07723           if ($parser->parse())
07724           {
07725             $this->headers = $parser->headers;
07726             $this->body = $parser->body;
07727             $this->status_code = $parser->status_code;
07728             if ((in_array($this->status_code, array(300, 301, 302, 303, 307)) || $this->status_code > 307 && $this->status_code < 400) && isset($this->headers['location']) && $this->redirects < $redirects)
07729             {
07730               $this->redirects++;
07731               $location = SimplePie_Misc::absolutize_url($this->headers['location'], $url);
07732               return $this->SimplePie_File($location, $timeout, $redirects, $headers, $useragent, $force_fsockopen);
07733             }
07734           }
07735         }
07736       }
07737       else
07738       {
07739         $this->method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE | SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_FSOCKOPEN;
07740         $url_parts = parse_url($url);
07741         $socket_host = $url_parts['host'];
07742         if (isset($url_parts['scheme']) && strtolower($url_parts['scheme']) === 'https')
07743         {
07744           $socket_host = "ssl://$url_parts[host]";
07745           $url_parts['port'] = 443;
07746         }
07747         if (!isset($url_parts['port']))
07748         {
07749           $url_parts['port'] = 80;
07750         }
07751         $fp = @fsockopen($socket_host, $url_parts['port'], $errno, $errstr, $timeout);
07752         if (!$fp)
07753         {
07754           $this->error = 'fsockopen error: ' . $errstr;
07755           $this->success = false;
07756         }
07757         else
07758         {
07759           stream_set_timeout($fp, $timeout);
07760           if (isset($url_parts['path']))
07761           {
07762             if (isset($url_parts['query']))
07763             {
07764               $get = "$url_parts[path]?$url_parts[query]";
07765             }
07766             else
07767             {
07768               $get = $url_parts['path'];
07769             }
07770           }
07771           else
07772           {
07773             $get = '/';
07774           }
07775           $out = "GET $get HTTP/1.0\r\n";
07776           $out .= "Host: $url_parts[host]\r\n";
07777           $out .= "User-Agent: $useragent\r\n";
07778           if (extension_loaded('zlib'))
07779           {
07780             $out .= "Accept-Encoding: x-gzip,gzip,deflate\r\n";
07781           }
07782 
07783           if (isset($url_parts['user']) && isset($url_parts['pass']))
07784           {
07785             $out .= "Authorization: Basic " . base64_encode("$url_parts[user]:$url_parts[pass]") . "\r\n";
07786           }
07787           foreach ($headers as $key => $value)
07788           {
07789             $out .= "$key: $value\r\n";
07790           }
07791           $out .= "Connection: Close\r\n\r\n";
07792           fwrite($fp, $out);
07793 
07794           $info = stream_get_meta_data($fp);
07795 
07796           $this->headers = '';
07797           while (!$info['eof'] && !$info['timed_out'])
07798           {
07799             $this->headers .= fread($fp, 1160);
07800             $info = stream_get_meta_data($fp);
07801           }
07802           if (!$info['timed_out'])
07803           {
07804             $parser = new SimplePie_HTTP_Parser($this->headers);
07805             if ($parser->parse())
07806             {
07807               $this->headers = $parser->headers;
07808               $this->body = $parser->body;
07809               $this->status_code = $parser->status_code;
07810               if ((in_array($this->status_code, array(300, 301, 302, 303, 307)) || $this->status_code > 307 && $this->status_code < 400) && isset($this->headers['location']) && $this->redirects < $redirects)
07811               {
07812                 $this->redirects++;
07813                 $location = SimplePie_Misc::absolutize_url($this->headers['location'], $url);
07814                 return $this->SimplePie_File($location, $timeout, $redirects, $headers, $useragent, $force_fsockopen);
07815               }
07816               if (isset($this->headers['content-encoding']))
07817               {
07818                 // Hey, we act dumb elsewhere, so let's do that here too
07819                 switch (strtolower(trim($this->headers['content-encoding'], "\x09\x0A\x0D\x20")))
07820                 {
07821                   case 'gzip':
07822                   case 'x-gzip':
07823                     $decoder = new SimplePie_gzdecode($this->body);
07824                     if (!$decoder->parse())
07825                     {
07826                       $this->error = 'Unable to decode HTTP "gzip" stream';
07827                       $this->success = false;
07828                     }
07829                     else
07830                     {
07831                       $this->body = $decoder->data;
07832                     }
07833                     break;
07834 
07835                   case 'deflate':
07836                     if (($body = gzuncompress($this->body)) === false)
07837                     {
07838                       if (($body = gzinflate($this->body)) === false)
07839                       {
07840                         $this->error = 'Unable to decode HTTP "deflate" stream';
07841                         $this->success = false;
07842                       }
07843                     }
07844                     $this->body = $body;
07845                     break;
07846 
07847                   default:
07848                     $this->error = 'Unknown content coding';
07849                     $this->success = false;
07850                 }
07851               }
07852             }
07853           }
07854           else
07855           {
07856             $this->error = 'fsocket timed out';
07857             $this->success = false;
07858           }
07859           fclose($fp);
07860         }
07861       }
07862     }
07863     else
07864     {
07865       $this->method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_LOCAL | SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_FILE_GET_CONTENTS;
07866       if (!$this->body = file_get_contents($url))
07867       {
07868         $this->error = 'file_get_contents could not read the file';
07869         $this->success = false;
07870       }
07871     }
07872   }
07873 }
07874 
07880 class SimplePie_HTTP_Parser
07881 {
07888   var $http_version = 0.0;
07889 
07896   var $status_code = 0;
07897 
07904   var $reason = '';
07905 
07912   var $headers = array();
07913 
07920   var $body = '';
07921 
07928   var $state = 'http_version';
07929 
07936   var $data = '';
07937 
07944   var $data_length = 0;
07945 
07952   var $position = 0;
07953 
07960   var $name = '';
07961 
07968   var $value = '';
07969 
07976   function SimplePie_HTTP_Parser($data)
07977   {
07978     $this->data = $data;
07979     $this->data_length = strlen($this->data);
07980   }
07981 
07988   function parse()
07989   {
07990     while ($this->state && $this->state !== 'emit' && $this->has_data())
07991     {
07992       $state = $this->state;
07993       $this->$state();
07994     }
07995     $this->data = '';
07996     if ($this->state === 'emit' || $this->state === 'body')
07997     {
07998       return true;
07999     }
08000     else
08001     {
08002       $this->http_version = '';
08003       $this->status_code = '';
08004       $this->reason = '';
08005       $this->headers = array();
08006       $this->body = '';
08007       return false;
08008     }
08009   }
08010 
08017   function has_data()
08018   {
08019     return (bool) ($this->position < $this->data_length);
08020   }
08021 
08028   function is_linear_whitespace()
08029   {
08030     return (bool) ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x09"
08031       || $this->data[$this->position] === "\x20"
08032       || ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x0A"
08033         && isset($this->data[$this->position + 1])
08034         && ($this->data[$this->position + 1] === "\x09" || $this->data[$this->position + 1] === "\x20")));
08035   }
08036 
08042   function http_version()
08043   {
08044     if (strpos($this->data, "\x0A") !== false && strtoupper(substr($this->data, 0, 5)) === 'HTTP/')
08045     {
08046       $len = strspn($this->data, '0123456789.', 5);
08047       $this->http_version = substr($this->data, 5, $len);
08048       $this->position += 5 + $len;
08049       if (substr_count($this->http_version, '.') <= 1)
08050       {
08051         $this->http_version = (float) $this->http_version;
08052         $this->position += strspn($this->data, "\x09\x20", $this->position);
08053         $this->state = 'status';
08054       }
08055       else
08056       {
08057         $this->state = false;
08058       }
08059     }
08060     else
08061     {
08062       $this->state = false;
08063     }
08064   }
08065 
08071   function status()
08072   {
08073     if ($len = strspn($this->data, '0123456789', $this->position))
08074     {
08075       $this->status_code = (int) substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
08076       $this->position += $len;
08077       $this->state = 'reason';
08078     }
08079     else
08080     {
08081       $this->state = false;
08082     }
08083   }
08084 
08090   function reason()
08091   {
08092     $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x0A", $this->position);
08093     $this->reason = trim(substr($this->data, $this->position, $len), "\x09\x0D\x20");
08094     $this->position += $len + 1;
08095     $this->state = 'new_line';
08096   }
08097 
08103   function new_line()
08104   {
08105     $this->value = trim($this->value, "\x0D\x20");
08106     if ($this->name !== '' && $this->value !== '')
08107     {
08108       $this->name = strtolower($this->name);
08109       if (isset($this->headers[$this->name]))
08110       {
08111         $this->headers[$this->name] .= ', ' . $this->value;
08112       }
08113       else
08114       {
08115         $this->headers[$this->name] = $this->value;
08116       }
08117     }
08118     $this->name = '';
08119     $this->value = '';
08120     if (substr($this->data[$this->position], 0, 2) === "\x0D\x0A")
08121     {
08122       $this->position += 2;
08123       $this->state = 'body';
08124     }
08125     elseif ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x0A")
08126     {
08127       $this->position++;
08128       $this->state = 'body';
08129     }
08130     else
08131     {
08132       $this->state = 'name';
08133     }
08134   }
08135 
08141   function name()
08142   {
08143     $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x0A:", $this->position);
08144     if (isset($this->data[$this->position + $len]))
08145     {
08146       if ($this->data[$this->position + $len] === "\x0A")
08147       {
08148         $this->position += $len;
08149         $this->state = 'new_line';
08150       }
08151       else
08152       {
08153         $this->name = substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
08154         $this->position += $len + 1;
08155         $this->state = 'value';
08156       }
08157     }
08158     else
08159     {
08160       $this->state = false;
08161     }
08162   }
08163 
08169   function linear_whitespace()
08170   {
08171     do
08172     {
08173       if (substr($this->data, $this->position, 2) === "\x0D\x0A")
08174       {
08175         $this->position += 2;
08176       }
08177       elseif ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x0A")
08178       {
08179         $this->position++;
08180       }
08181       $this->position += strspn($this->data, "\x09\x20", $this->position);
08182     } while ($this->has_data() && $this->is_linear_whitespace());
08183     $this->value .= "\x20";
08184   }
08185 
08191   function value()
08192   {
08193     if ($this->is_linear_whitespace())
08194     {
08195       $this->linear_whitespace();
08196     }
08197     else
08198     {
08199       switch ($this->data[$this->position])
08200       {
08201         case '"':
08202           $this->position++;
08203           $this->state = 'quote';
08204           break;
08205 
08206         case "\x0A":
08207           $this->position++;
08208           $this->state = 'new_line';
08209           break;
08210 
08211         default:
08212           $this->state = 'value_char';
08213           break;
08214       }
08215     }
08216   }
08217 
08223   function value_char()
08224   {
08225     $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x09\x20\x0A\"", $this->position);
08226     $this->value .= substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
08227     $this->position += $len;
08228     $this->state = 'value';
08229   }
08230 
08236   function quote()
08237   {
08238     if ($this->is_linear_whitespace())
08239     {
08240       $this->linear_whitespace();
08241     }
08242     else
08243     {
08244       switch ($this->data[$this->position])
08245       {
08246         case '"':
08247           $this->position++;
08248           $this->state = 'value';
08249           break;
08250 
08251         case "\x0A":
08252           $this->position++;
08253           $this->state = 'new_line';
08254           break;
08255 
08256         case '\\':
08257           $this->position++;
08258           $this->state = 'quote_escaped';
08259           break;
08260 
08261         default:
08262           $this->state = 'quote_char';
08263           break;
08264       }
08265     }
08266   }
08267 
08273   function quote_char()
08274   {
08275     $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x09\x20\x0A\"\\", $this->position);
08276     $this->value .= substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
08277     $this->position += $len;
08278     $this->state = 'value';
08279   }
08280 
08286   function quote_escaped()
08287   {
08288     $this->value .= $this->data[$this->position];
08289     $this->position++;
08290     $this->state = 'quote';
08291   }
08292 
08298   function body()
08299   {
08300     $this->body = substr($this->data, $this->position);
08301     $this->state = 'emit';
08302   }
08303 }
08304 
08310 class SimplePie_gzdecode
08311 {
08318   var $compressed_data;
08319 
08325   var $compressed_size;
08326 
08332   var $min_compressed_size = 18;
08333 
08339   var $position = 0;
08340 
08346   var $flags;
08347 
08354   var $data;
08355 
08361   var $MTIME;
08362 
08368   var $XFL;
08369 
08375   var $OS;
08376 
08384   var $SI1;
08385 
08393   var $SI2;
08394 
08402   var $extra_field;
08403 
08409   var $filename;
08410 
08416   var $comment;
08417 
08423   function __set($name, $value)
08424   {
08425     trigger_error("Cannot write property $name", E_USER_ERROR);
08426   }
08427 
08433   function SimplePie_gzdecode($data)
08434   {
08435     $this->compressed_data = $data;
08436     $this->compressed_size = strlen($data);
08437   }
08438 
08444   function parse()
08445   {
08446     if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08447     {
08448       // Check ID1, ID2, and CM
08449       if (substr($this->compressed_data, 0, 3) !== "\x1F\x8B\x08")
08450       {
08451         return false;
08452       }
08453 
08454       // Get the FLG (FLaGs)
08455       $this->flags = ord($this->compressed_data[3]);
08456 
08457       // FLG bits above (1 << 4) are reserved
08458       if ($this->flags > 0x1F)
08459       {
08460         return false;
08461       }
08462 
08463       // Advance the pointer after the above
08464       $this->position += 4;
08465 
08466       // MTIME
08467       $mtime = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 4);
08468       // Reverse the string if we're on a big-endian arch because l is the only signed long and is machine endianness
08469       if (current(unpack('S', "\x00\x01")) === 1)
08470       {
08471         $mtime = strrev($mtime);
08472       }
08473       $this->MTIME = current(unpack('l', $mtime));
08474       $this->position += 4;
08475 
08476       // Get the XFL (eXtra FLags)
08477       $this->XFL = ord($this->compressed_data[$this->position++]);
08478 
08479       // Get the OS (Operating System)
08480       $this->OS = ord($this->compressed_data[$this->position++]);
08481 
08482       // Parse the FEXTRA
08483       if ($this->flags & 4)
08484       {
08485         // Read subfield IDs
08486         $this->SI1 = $this->compressed_data[$this->position++];
08487         $this->SI2 = $this->compressed_data[$this->position++];
08488 
08489         // SI2 set to zero is reserved for future use
08490         if ($this->SI2 === "\x00")
08491         {
08492           return false;
08493         }
08494 
08495         // Get the length of the extra field
08496         $len = current(unpack('v', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 2)));
08497         $this->position += 2;
08498 
08499         // Check the length of the string is still valid
08500         $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 4;
08501         if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08502         {
08503           // Set the extra field to the given data
08504           $this->extra_field = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, $len);
08505           $this->position += $len;
08506         }
08507         else
08508         {
08509           return false;
08510         }
08511       }
08512 
08513       // Parse the FNAME
08514       if ($this->flags & 8)
08515       {
08516         // Get the length of the filename
08517         $len = strcspn($this->compressed_data, "\x00", $this->position);
08518 
08519         // Check the length of the string is still valid
08520         $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 1;
08521         if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08522         {
08523           // Set the original filename to the given string
08524           $this->filename = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, $len);
08525           $this->position += $len + 1;
08526         }
08527         else
08528         {
08529           return false;
08530         }
08531       }
08532 
08533       // Parse the FCOMMENT
08534       if ($this->flags & 16)
08535       {
08536         // Get the length of the comment
08537         $len = strcspn($this->compressed_data, "\x00", $this->position);
08538 
08539         // Check the length of the string is still valid
08540         $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 1;
08541         if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08542         {
08543           // Set the original comment to the given string
08544           $this->comment = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, $len);
08545           $this->position += $len + 1;
08546         }
08547         else
08548         {
08549           return false;
08550         }
08551       }
08552 
08553       // Parse the FHCRC
08554       if ($this->flags & 2)
08555       {
08556         // Check the length of the string is still valid
08557         $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 2;
08558         if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08559         {
08560           // Read the CRC
08561           $crc = current(unpack('v', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 2)));
08562 
08563           // Check the CRC matches
08564           if ((crc32(substr($this->compressed_data, 0, $this->position)) & 0xFFFF) === $crc)
08565           {
08566             $this->position += 2;
08567           }
08568           else
08569           {
08570             return false;
08571           }
08572         }
08573         else
08574         {
08575           return false;
08576         }
08577       }
08578 
08579       // Decompress the actual data
08580       if (($this->data = gzinflate(substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, -8))) === false)
08581       {
08582         return false;
08583       }
08584       else
08585       {
08586         $this->position = $this->compressed_size - 8;
08587       }
08588 
08589       // Check CRC of data
08590       $crc = current(unpack('V', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 4)));
08591       $this->position += 4;
08592       /*if (extension_loaded('hash') && sprintf('%u', current(unpack('V', hash('crc32b', $this->data)))) !== sprintf('%u', $crc))
08593       {
08594         return false;
08595       }*/
08596 
08597       // Check ISIZE of data
08598       $isize = current(unpack('V', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 4)));
08599       $this->position += 4;
08600       if (sprintf('%u', strlen($this->data) & 0xFFFFFFFF) !== sprintf('%u', $isize))
08601       {
08602         return false;
08603       }
08604 
08605       // Wow, against all odds, we've actually got a valid gzip string
08606       return true;
08607     }
08608     else
08609     {
08610       return false;
08611     }
08612   }
08613 }
08614 
08615 class SimplePie_Cache
08616 {
08622   function SimplePie_Cache()
08623   {
08624     trigger_error('Please call SimplePie_Cache::create() instead of the constructor', E_USER_ERROR);
08625   }
08626 
08633   function create($location, $filename, $extension)
08634   {
08635     $location_iri = new SimplePie_IRI($location);
08636     switch ($location_iri->get_scheme())
08637     {
08638       case 'mysql':
08639         if (extension_loaded('mysql'))
08640         {
08641           return new SimplePie_Cache_MySQL($location_iri, $filename, $extension);
08642         }
08643         break;
08644 
08645       default:
08646         return new SimplePie_Cache_File($location, $filename, $extension);
08647     }
08648   }
08649 }
08650 
08651 class SimplePie_Cache_File
08652 {
08653   var $location;
08654   var $filename;
08655   var $extension;
08656   var $name;
08657 
08658   function SimplePie_Cache_File($location, $filename, $extension)
08659   {
08660     $this->location = $location;
08661     $this->filename = $filename;
08662     $this->extension = $extension;
08663     $this->name = "$this->location/$this->filename.$this->extension";
08664   }
08665 
08666   function save($data)
08667   {
08668     if (file_exists($this->name) && is_writeable($this->name) || file_exists($this->location) && is_writeable($this->location))
08669     {
08670       if (is_a($data, 'SimplePie'))
08671       {
08672         $data = $data->data;
08673       }
08674 
08675       $data = serialize($data);
08676 
08677       if (function_exists('file_put_contents'))
08678       {
08679         return (bool) file_put_contents($this->name, $data);
08680       }
08681       else
08682       {
08683         $fp = fopen($this->name, 'wb');
08684         if ($fp)
08685         {
08686           fwrite($fp, $data);
08687           fclose($fp);
08688           return true;
08689         }
08690       }
08691     }
08692     return false;
08693   }
08694 
08695   function load()
08696   {
08697     if (file_exists($this->name) && is_readable($this->name))
08698     {
08699       return unserialize(file_get_contents($this->name));
08700     }
08701     return false;
08702   }
08703 
08704   function mtime()
08705   {
08706     if (file_exists($this->name))
08707     {
08708       return filemtime($this->name);
08709     }
08710     return false;
08711   }
08712 
08713   function touch()
08714   {
08715     if (file_exists($this->name))
08716     {
08717       return touch($this->name);
08718     }
08719     return false;
08720   }
08721 
08722   function unlink()
08723   {
08724     if (file_exists($this->name))
08725     {
08726       return unlink($this->name);
08727     }
08728     return false;
08729   }
08730 }
08731 
08732 class SimplePie_Cache_DB
08733 {
08734   function prepare_simplepie_object_for_cache($data)
08735   {
08736     $items = $data->get_items();
08737     $items_by_id = array();
08738 
08739     if (!empty($items))
08740     {
08741       foreach ($items as $item)
08742       {
08743         $items_by_id[$item->get_id()] = $item;
08744       }
08745 
08746       if (count($items_by_id) !== count($items))
08747       {
08748         $items_by_id = array();
08749         foreach ($items as $item)
08750         {
08751           $items_by_id[$item->get_id(true)] = $item;
08752         }
08753       }
08754 
08755       if (isset($data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]))
08756       {
08757         $channel =& $data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0];
08758       }
08759       elseif (isset($data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]))
08760       {
08761         $channel =& $data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0];
08762       }
08763       elseif (isset($data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]))
08764       {
08765         $channel =& $data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0];
08766       }
08767       elseif (isset($data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['channel'][0]))
08768       {
08769         $channel =& $data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['channel'][0];
08770       }
08771       else
08772       {
08773         $channel = null;
08774       }
08775 
08776       if ($channel !== null)
08777       {
08778         if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['entry']))
08779         {
08780           unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['entry']);
08781         }
08782         if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['entry']))
08783         {
08784           unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['entry']);
08785         }
08786         if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['item']))
08787         {
08788           unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['item']);
08789         }
08790         if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['item']))
08791         {
08792           unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['item']);
08793         }
08794         if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['item']))
08795         {
08796           unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['item']);
08797         }
08798       }
08799       if (isset($data->data['items']))
08800       {
08801         unset($data->data['items']);
08802       }
08803       if (isset($data->data['ordered_items']))
08804       {
08805         unset($data->data['ordered_items']);
08806       }
08807     }
08808     return array(serialize($data->data), $items_by_id);
08809   }
08810 }
08811 
08812 class SimplePie_Cache_MySQL extends SimplePie_Cache_DB
08813 {
08814   var $mysql;
08815   var $options;
08816   var $id;
08817 
08818   function SimplePie_Cache_MySQL($mysql_location, $name, $extension)
08819   {
08820     $host = $mysql_location->get_host();
08821     if (SimplePie_Misc::stripos($host, 'unix(') === 0 && substr($host, -1) === ')')
08822     {
08823       $server = ':' . substr($host, 5, -1);
08824     }
08825     else
08826     {
08827       $server = $host;
08828       if ($mysql_location->get_port() !== null)
08829       {
08830         $server .= ':' . $mysql_location->get_port();
08831       }
08832     }
08833 
08834     if (strpos($mysql_location->get_userinfo(), ':') !== false)
08835     {
08836       list($username, $password) = explode(':', $mysql_location->get_userinfo(), 2);
08837     }
08838     else
08839     {
08840       $username = $mysql_location->get_userinfo();
08841       $password = null;
08842     }
08843 
08844     if ($this->mysql = mysql_connect($server, $username, $password))
08845     {
08846       $this->id = $name . $extension;
08847       $this->options = SimplePie_Misc::parse_str($mysql_location->get_query());
08848       if (!isset($this->options['prefix'][0]))
08849       {
08850         $this->options['prefix'][0] = '';
08851       }
08852 
08853       if (mysql_select_db(ltrim($mysql_location->get_path(), '/'))
08854         && mysql_query('SET NAMES utf8')
08855         && ($query = mysql_unbuffered_query('SHOW TABLES')))
08856       {
08857         $db = array();
08858         while ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query))
08859         {
08860           $db[] = $row[0];
08861         }
08862 
08863         if (!in_array($this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data', $db))
08864         {
08865           if (!mysql_query('CREATE TABLE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` (`id` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `items` SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `data` BLOB NOT NULL, `mtime` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, UNIQUE (`id`(125)))'))
08866           {
08867             $this->mysql = null;
08868           }
08869         }
08870 
08871         if (!in_array($this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items', $db))
08872         {
08873           if (!mysql_query('CREATE TABLE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` (`feed_id` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `id` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `data` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `posted` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, INDEX `feed_id` (`feed_id`(125)))'))
08874           {
08875             $this->mysql = null;
08876           }
08877         }
08878       }
08879       else
08880       {
08881         $this->mysql = null;
08882       }
08883     }
08884   }
08885 
08886   function save($data)
08887   {
08888     if ($this->mysql)
08889     {
08890       $feed_id = "'" . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'";
08891 
08892       if (is_a($data, 'SimplePie'))
08893       {
08894         if (SIMPLEPIE_PHP5)
08895         {
08896           // This keyword needs to defy coding standards for PHP4 compatibility
08897           $data = clone($data);
08898         }
08899 
08900         $prepared = $this->prepare_simplepie_object_for_cache($data);
08901 
08902         if ($query = mysql_query('SELECT `id` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id, $this->mysql))
08903         {
08904           if (mysql_num_rows($query))
08905           {
08906             $items = count($prepared[1]);
08907             if ($items)
08908             {
08909               $sql = 'UPDATE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` SET `items` = ' . $items . ', `data` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($prepared[0]) . '\', `mtime` = ' . time() . ' WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id;
08910             }
08911             else
08912             {
08913               $sql = 'UPDATE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` SET `data` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($prepared[0]) . '\', `mtime` = ' . time() . ' WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id;
08914             }
08915 
08916             if (!mysql_query($sql, $this->mysql))
08917             {
08918               return false;
08919             }
08920           }
08921           elseif (!mysql_query('INSERT INTO `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` (`id`, `items`, `data`, `mtime`) VALUES(' . $feed_id . ', ' . count($prepared[1]) . ', \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($prepared[0]) . '\', ' . time() . ')', $this->mysql))
08922           {
08923             return false;
08924           }
08925 
08926           $ids = array_keys($prepared[1]);
08927           if (!empty($ids))
08928           {
08929             foreach ($ids as $id)
08930             {
08931               $database_ids[] = mysql_real_escape_string($id);
08932             }
08933 
08934             if ($query = mysql_unbuffered_query('SELECT `id` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` WHERE `id` = \'' . implode('\' OR `id` = \'', $database_ids) . '\' AND `feed_id` = ' . $feed_id, $this->mysql))
08935             {
08936               $existing_ids = array();
08937               while ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query))
08938               {
08939                 $existing_ids[] = $row[0];
08940               }
08941 
08942               $new_ids = array_diff($ids, $existing_ids);
08943 
08944               foreach ($new_ids as $new_id)
08945               {
08946                 if (!($date = $prepared[1][$new_id]->get_date('U')))
08947                 {
08948                   $date = time();
08949                 }
08950 
08951                 if (!mysql_query('INSERT INTO `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` (`feed_id`, `id`, `data`, `posted`) VALUES(' . $feed_id . ', \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($new_id) . '\', \'' . mysql_real_escape_string(serialize($prepared[1][$new_id]->data)) . '\', ' . $date . ')', $this->mysql))
08952                 {
08953                   return false;
08954                 }
08955               }
08956               return true;
08957             }
08958           }
08959           else
08960           {
08961             return true;
08962           }
08963         }
08964       }
08965       elseif ($query = mysql_query('SELECT `id` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id, $this->mysql))
08966       {
08967         if (mysql_num_rows($query))
08968         {
08969           if (mysql_query('UPDATE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` SET `items` = 0, `data` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string(serialize($data)) . '\', `mtime` = ' . time() . ' WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id, $this->mysql))
08970           {
08971             return true;
08972           }
08973         }
08974         elseif (mysql_query('INSERT INTO `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` (`id`, `items`, `data`, `mtime`) VALUES(\'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . '\', 0, \'' . mysql_real_escape_string(serialize($data)) . '\', ' . time() . ')', $this->mysql))
08975         {
08976           return true;
08977         }
08978       }
08979     }
08980     return false;
08981   }
08982 
08983   function load()
08984   {
08985     if ($this->mysql && ($query = mysql_query('SELECT `items`, `data` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)) && ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query)))
08986     {
08987       $data = unserialize($row[1]);
08988 
08989       if (isset($this->options['items'][0]))
08990       {
08991         $items = (int) $this->options['items'][0];
08992       }
08993       else
08994       {
08995         $items = (int) $row[0];
08996       }
08997 
08998       if ($items !== 0)
08999       {
09000         if (isset($data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]))
09001         {
09002           $feed =& $data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0];
09003         }
09004         elseif (isset($data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]))
09005         {
09006           $feed =& $data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0];
09007         }
09008         elseif (isset($data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]))
09009         {
09010           $feed =& $data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0];
09011         }
09012         elseif (isset($data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]))
09013         {
09014           $feed =& $data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0];
09015         }
09016         else
09017         {
09018           $feed = null;
09019         }
09020 
09021         if ($feed !== null)
09022         {
09023           $sql = 'SELECT `data` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` WHERE `feed_id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . '\' ORDER BY `posted` DESC';
09024           if ($items > 0)
09025           {
09026             $sql .= ' LIMIT ' . $items;
09027           }
09028 
09029           if ($query = mysql_unbuffered_query($sql, $this->mysql))
09030           {
09031             while ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query))
09032             {
09033               $feed['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['entry'][] = unserialize($row[0]);
09034             }
09035           }
09036           else
09037           {
09038             return false;
09039           }
09040         }
09041       }
09042       return $data;
09043     }
09044     return false;
09045   }
09046 
09047   function mtime()
09048   {
09049     if ($this->mysql && ($query = mysql_query('SELECT `mtime` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)) && ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query)))
09050     {
09051       return $row[0];
09052     }
09053     else
09054     {
09055       return false;
09056     }
09057   }
09058 
09059   function touch()
09060   {
09061     if ($this->mysql && ($query = mysql_query('UPDATE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` SET `mtime` = ' . time() . ' WHERE `id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)) && mysql_affected_rows($this->mysql))
09062     {
09063       return true;
09064     }
09065     else
09066     {
09067       return false;
09068     }
09069   }
09070 
09071   function unlink()
09072   {
09073     if ($this->mysql && ($query = mysql_query('DELETE FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)) && ($query2 = mysql_query('DELETE FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` WHERE `feed_id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)))
09074     {
09075       return true;
09076     }
09077     else
09078     {
09079       return false;
09080     }
09081   }
09082 }
09083 
09084 class SimplePie_Misc
09085 {
09086   function time_hms($seconds)
09087   {
09088     $time = '';
09089 
09090     $hours = floor($seconds / 3600);
09091     $remainder = $seconds % 3600;
09092     if ($hours > 0)
09093     {
09094       $time .= $hours.':';
09095     }
09096 
09097     $minutes = floor($remainder / 60);
09098     $seconds = $remainder % 60;
09099     if ($minutes < 10 && $hours > 0)
09100     {
09101       $minutes = '0' . $minutes;
09102     }
09103     if ($seconds < 10)
09104     {
09105       $seconds = '0' . $seconds;
09106     }
09107 
09108     $time .= $minutes.':';
09109     $time .= $seconds;
09110 
09111     return $time;
09112   }
09113 
09114   function absolutize_url($relative, $base)
09115   {
09116     $iri = SimplePie_IRI::absolutize(new SimplePie_IRI($base), $relative);
09117     return $iri->get_iri();
09118   }
09119 
09120   function remove_dot_segments($input)
09121   {
09122     $output = '';
09123     while (strpos($input, './') !== false || strpos($input, '/.') !== false || $input === '.' || $input === '..')
09124     {
09125       // A: If the input buffer begins with a prefix of "../" or "./", then remove that prefix from the input buffer; otherwise,
09126       if (strpos($input, '../') === 0)
09127       {
09128         $input = substr($input, 3);
09129       }
09130       elseif (strpos($input, './') === 0)
09131       {
09132         $input = substr($input, 2);
09133       }
09134       // B: if the input buffer begins with a prefix of "/./" or "/.", where "." is a complete path segment, then replace that prefix with "/" in the input buffer; otherwise,
09135       elseif (strpos($input, '/./') === 0)
09136       {
09137         $input = substr_replace($input, '/', 0, 3);
09138       }
09139       elseif ($input === '/.')
09140       {
09141         $input = '/';
09142       }
09143       // C: if the input buffer begins with a prefix of "/../" or "/..", where ".." is a complete path segment, then replace that prefix with "/" in the input buffer and remove the last segment and its preceding "/" (if any) from the output buffer; otherwise,
09144       elseif (strpos($input, '/../') === 0)
09145       {
09146         $input = substr_replace($input, '/', 0, 4);
09147         $output = substr_replace($output, '', strrpos($output, '/'));
09148       }
09149       elseif ($input === '/..')
09150       {
09151         $input = '/';
09152         $output = substr_replace($output, '', strrpos($output, '/'));
09153       }
09154       // D: if the input buffer consists only of "." or "..", then remove that from the input buffer; otherwise,
09155       elseif ($input === '.' || $input === '..')
09156       {
09157         $input = '';
09158       }
09159       // E: move the first path segment in the input buffer to the end of the output buffer, including the initial "/" character (if any) and any subsequent characters up to, but not including, the next "/" character or the end of the input buffer
09160       elseif (($pos = strpos($input, '/', 1)) !== false)
09161       {
09162         $output .= substr($input, 0, $pos);
09163         $input = substr_replace($input, '', 0, $pos);
09164       }
09165       else
09166       {
09167         $output .= $input;
09168         $input = '';
09169       }
09170     }
09171     return $output . $input;
09172   }
09173 
09174   function get_element($realname, $string)
09175   {
09176     $return = array();
09177     $name = preg_quote($realname, '/');
09178     if (preg_match_all("/<($name)" . SIMPLEPIE_PCRE_HTML_ATTRIBUTE . "(>(.*)<\/$name>|(\/)?>)/siU", $string, $matches, PREG_SET_ORDER | PREG_OFFSET_CAPTURE))
09179     {
09180       for ($i = 0, $total_matches = count($matches); $i < $total_matches; $i++)
09181       {
09182         $return[$i]['tag'] = $realname;
09183         $return[$i]['full'] = $matches[$i][0][0];
09184         $return[$i]['offset'] = $matches[$i][0][1];
09185         if (strlen($matches[$i][3][0]) <= 2)
09186         {
09187           $return[$i]['self_closing'] = true;
09188         }
09189         else
09190         {
09191           $return[$i]['self_closing'] = false;
09192           $return[$i]['content'] = $matches[$i][4][0];
09193         }
09194         $return[$i]['attribs'] = array();
09195         if (isset($matches[$i][2][0]) && preg_match_all('/[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]+([^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x2F\x3E][^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x2F\x3D\x3E]*)(?:[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]*=[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]*(?:"([^"]*)"|\'([^\']*)\'|([^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x22\x27\x3E][^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x3E]*)?))?/', ' ' . $matches[$i][2][0] . ' ', $attribs, PREG_SET_ORDER))
09196         {
09197           for ($j = 0, $total_attribs = count($attribs); $j < $total_attribs; $j++)
09198           {
09199             if (count($attribs[$j]) === 2)
09200             {
09201               $attribs[$j][2] = $attribs[$j][1];
09202             }
09203             $return[$i]['attribs'][strtolower($attribs[$j][1])]['data'] = SimplePie_Misc::entities_decode(end($attribs[$j]), 'UTF-8');
09204           }
09205         }
09206       }
09207     }
09208     return $return;
09209   }
09210 
09211   function element_implode($element)
09212   {
09213     $full = "<$element[tag]";
09214     foreach ($element['attribs'] as $key => $value)
09215     {
09216       $key = strtolower($key);
09217       $full .= " $key=\"" . htmlspecialchars($value['data']) . '"';
09218     }
09219     if ($element['self_closing'])
09220     {
09221       $full .= ' />';
09222     }
09223     else
09224     {
09225       $full .= ">$element[content]</$element[tag]>";
09226     }
09227     return $full;
09228   }
09229 
09230   function error($message, $level, $file, $line)
09231   {
09232     if ((ini_get('error_reporting') & $level) > 0)
09233     {
09234       switch ($level)
09235       {
09236         case E_USER_ERROR:
09237           $note = 'PHP Error';
09238           break;
09239         case E_USER_WARNING:
09240           $note = 'PHP Warning';
09241           break;
09242         case E_USER_NOTICE:
09243           $note = 'PHP Notice';
09244           break;
09245         default:
09246           $note = 'Unknown Error';
09247           break;
09248       }
09249 
09250       $log_error = true;
09251       if (!function_exists('error_log'))
09252       {
09253         $log_error = false;
09254       }
09255 
09256       $log_file = @ini_get('error_log');
09257       if (!empty($log_file) && ('syslog' != $log_file) && !@is_writable($log_file))
09258       {
09259         $log_error = false;
09260       }
09261 
09262       if ($log_error)
09263       {
09264         @error_log("$note: $message in $file on line $line", 0);
09265       }
09266     }
09267 
09268     return $message;
09269   }
09270 
09293   function display_cached_file($identifier_url, $cache_location = './cache', $cache_extension = 'spc', $cache_class = 'SimplePie_Cache', $cache_name_function = 'md5')
09294   {
09295     $cache = call_user_func(array($cache_class, 'create'), $cache_location, $identifier_url, $cache_extension);
09296 
09297     if ($file = $cache->load())
09298     {
09299       if (isset($file['headers']['content-type']))
09300       {
09301         header('Content-type:' . $file['headers']['content-type']);
09302       }
09303       else
09304       {
09305         header('Content-type: application/octet-stream');
09306       }
09307       header('Expires: ' . gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', time() + 604800) . ' GMT'); // 7 days
09308       echo $file['body'];
09309       exit;
09310     }
09311 
09312     die('Cached file for ' . $identifier_url . ' cannot be found.');
09313   }
09314 
09315   function fix_protocol($url, $http = 1)
09316   {
09317     $url = SimplePie_Misc::normalize_url($url);
09318     $parsed = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($url);
09319     if ($parsed['scheme'] !== '' && $parsed['scheme'] !== 'http' && $parsed['scheme'] !== 'https')
09320     {
09321       return SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol(SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url('http', $parsed['authority'], $parsed['path'], $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']), $http);
09322     }
09323 
09324     if ($parsed['scheme'] === '' && $parsed['authority'] === '' && !file_exists($url))
09325     {
09326       return SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol(SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url('http', $parsed['path'], '', $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']), $http);
09327     }
09328 
09329     if ($http === 2 && $parsed['scheme'] !== '')
09330     {
09331       return "feed:$url";
09332     }
09333     elseif ($http === 3 && strtolower($parsed['scheme']) === 'http')
09334     {
09335       return substr_replace($url, 'podcast', 0, 4);
09336     }
09337     elseif ($http === 4 && strtolower($parsed['scheme']) === 'http')
09338     {
09339       return substr_replace($url, 'itpc', 0, 4);
09340     }
09341     else
09342     {
09343       return $url;
09344     }
09345   }
09346 
09347   function parse_url($url)
09348   {
09349     $iri = new SimplePie_IRI($url);
09350     return array(
09351       'scheme' => (string) $iri->get_scheme(),
09352       'authority' => (string) $iri->get_authority(),
09353       'path' => (string) $iri->get_path(),
09354       'query' => (string) $iri->get_query(),
09355       'fragment' => (string) $iri->get_fragment()
09356     );
09357   }
09358 
09359   function compress_parse_url($scheme = '', $authority = '', $path = '', $query = '', $fragment = '')
09360   {
09361     $iri = new SimplePie_IRI('');
09362     $iri->set_scheme($scheme);
09363     $iri->set_authority($authority);
09364     $iri->set_path($path);
09365     $iri->set_query($query);
09366     $iri->set_fragment($fragment);
09367     return $iri->get_iri();
09368   }
09369 
09370   function normalize_url($url)
09371   {
09372     $iri = new SimplePie_IRI($url);
09373     return $iri->get_iri();
09374   }
09375 
09376   function percent_encoding_normalization($match)
09377   {
09378     $integer = hexdec($match[1]);
09379     if ($integer >= 0x41 && $integer <= 0x5A || $integer >= 0x61 && $integer <= 0x7A || $integer >= 0x30 && $integer <= 0x39 || $integer === 0x2D || $integer === 0x2E || $integer === 0x5F || $integer === 0x7E)
09380     {
09381       return chr($integer);
09382     }
09383     else
09384     {
09385       return strtoupper($match[0]);
09386     }
09387   }
09388 
09400   function utf8_bad_replace($str)
09401   {
09402     if (function_exists('iconv') && ($return = @iconv('UTF-8', 'UTF-8//IGNORE', $str)))
09403     {
09404       return $return;
09405     }
09406     elseif (function_exists('mb_convert_encoding') && ($return = @mb_convert_encoding($str, 'UTF-8', 'UTF-8')))
09407     {
09408       return $return;
09409     }
09410     elseif (preg_match_all('/(?:[\x00-\x7F]|[\xC2-\xDF][\x80-\xBF]|\xE0[\xA0-\xBF][\x80-\xBF]|[\xE1-\xEC\xEE\xEF][\x80-\xBF]{2}|\xED[\x80-\x9F][\x80-\xBF]|\xF0[\x90-\xBF][\x80-\xBF]{2}|[\xF1-\xF3][\x80-\xBF]{3}|\xF4[\x80-\x8F][\x80-\xBF]{2})+/', $str, $matches))
09411     {
09412       return implode("\xEF\xBF\xBD", $matches[0]);
09413     }
09414     elseif ($str !== '')
09415     {
09416       return "\xEF\xBF\xBD";
09417     }
09418     else
09419     {
09420       return '';
09421     }
09422   }
09423 
09432   function windows_1252_to_utf8($string)
09433   {
09434     static $convert_table = array("\x80" => "\xE2\x82\xAC", "\x81" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x82" => "\xE2\x80\x9A", "\x83" => "\xC6\x92", "\x84" => "\xE2\x80\x9E", "\x85" => "\xE2\x80\xA6", "\x86" => "\xE2\x80\xA0", "\x87" => "\xE2\x80\xA1", "\x88" => "\xCB\x86", "\x89" => "\xE2\x80\xB0", "\x8A" => "\xC5\xA0", "\x8B" => "\xE2\x80\xB9", "\x8C" => "\xC5\x92", "\x8D" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x8E" => "\xC5\xBD", "\x8F" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x90" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x91" => "\xE2\x80\x98", "\x92" => "\xE2\x80\x99", "\x93" => "\xE2\x80\x9C", "\x94" => "\xE2\x80\x9D", "\x95" => "\xE2\x80\xA2", "\x96" => "\xE2\x80\x93", "\x97" => "\xE2\x80\x94", "\x98" => "\xCB\x9C", "\x99" => "\xE2\x84\xA2", "\x9A" => "\xC5\xA1", "\x9B" => "\xE2\x80\xBA", "\x9C" => "\xC5\x93", "\x9D" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x9E" => "\xC5\xBE", "\x9F" => "\xC5\xB8", "\xA0" => "\xC2\xA0", "\xA1" => "\xC2\xA1", "\xA2" => "\xC2\xA2", "\xA3" => "\xC2\xA3", "\xA4" => "\xC2\xA4", "\xA5" => "\xC2\xA5", "\xA6" => "\xC2\xA6", "\xA7" => "\xC2\xA7", "\xA8" => "\xC2\xA8", "\xA9" => "\xC2\xA9", "\xAA" => "\xC2\xAA", "\xAB" => "\xC2\xAB", "\xAC" => "\xC2\xAC", "\xAD" => "\xC2\xAD", "\xAE" => "\xC2\xAE", "\xAF" => "\xC2\xAF", "\xB0" => "\xC2\xB0", "\xB1" => "\xC2\xB1", "\xB2" => "\xC2\xB2", "\xB3" => "\xC2\xB3", "\xB4" => "\xC2\xB4", "\xB5" => "\xC2\xB5", "\xB6" => "\xC2\xB6", "\xB7" => "\xC2\xB7", "\xB8" => "\xC2\xB8", "\xB9" => "\xC2\xB9", "\xBA" => "\xC2\xBA", "\xBB" => "\xC2\xBB", "\xBC" => "\xC2\xBC", "\xBD" => "\xC2\xBD", "\xBE" => "\xC2\xBE", "\xBF" => "\xC2\xBF", "\xC0" => "\xC3\x80", "\xC1" => "\xC3\x81", "\xC2" => "\xC3\x82", "\xC3" => "\xC3\x83", "\xC4" => "\xC3\x84", "\xC5" => "\xC3\x85", "\xC6" => "\xC3\x86", "\xC7" => "\xC3\x87", "\xC8" => "\xC3\x88", "\xC9" => "\xC3\x89", "\xCA" => "\xC3\x8A", "\xCB" => "\xC3\x8B", "\xCC" => "\xC3\x8C", "\xCD" => "\xC3\x8D", "\xCE" => "\xC3\x8E", "\xCF" => "\xC3\x8F", "\xD0" => "\xC3\x90", "\xD1" => "\xC3\x91", "\xD2" => "\xC3\x92", "\xD3" => "\xC3\x93", "\xD4" => "\xC3\x94", "\xD5" => "\xC3\x95", "\xD6" => "\xC3\x96", "\xD7" => "\xC3\x97", "\xD8" => "\xC3\x98", "\xD9" => "\xC3\x99", "\xDA" => "\xC3\x9A", "\xDB" => "\xC3\x9B", "\xDC" => "\xC3\x9C", "\xDD" => "\xC3\x9D", "\xDE" => "\xC3\x9E", "\xDF" => "\xC3\x9F", "\xE0" => "\xC3\xA0", "\xE1" => "\xC3\xA1", "\xE2" => "\xC3\xA2", "\xE3" => "\xC3\xA3", "\xE4" => "\xC3\xA4", "\xE5" => "\xC3\xA5", "\xE6" => "\xC3\xA6", "\xE7" => "\xC3\xA7", "\xE8" => "\xC3\xA8", "\xE9" => "\xC3\xA9", "\xEA" => "\xC3\xAA", "\xEB" => "\xC3\xAB", "\xEC" => "\xC3\xAC", "\xED" => "\xC3\xAD", "\xEE" => "\xC3\xAE", "\xEF" => "\xC3\xAF", "\xF0" => "\xC3\xB0", "\xF1" => "\xC3\xB1", "\xF2" => "\xC3\xB2", "\xF3" => "\xC3\xB3", "\xF4" => "\xC3\xB4", "\xF5" => "\xC3\xB5", "\xF6" => "\xC3\xB6", "\xF7" => "\xC3\xB7", "\xF8" => "\xC3\xB8", "\xF9" => "\xC3\xB9", "\xFA" => "\xC3\xBA", "\xFB" => "\xC3\xBB", "\xFC" => "\xC3\xBC", "\xFD" => "\xC3\xBD", "\xFE" => "\xC3\xBE", "\xFF" => "\xC3\xBF");
09435 
09436     return strtr($string, $convert_table);
09437   }
09438 
09439   function change_encoding($data, $input, $output)
09440   {
09441     $input = SimplePie_Misc::encoding($input);
09442     $output = SimplePie_Misc::encoding($output);
09443 
09444     // We fail to fail on non US-ASCII bytes
09445     if ($input === 'US-ASCII')
09446     {
09447       static $non_ascii_octects = '';
09448       if (!$non_ascii_octects)
09449       {
09450         for ($i = 0x80; $i <= 0xFF; $i++)
09451         {
09452           $non_ascii_octects .= chr($i);
09453         }
09454       }
09455       $data = substr($data, 0, strcspn($data, $non_ascii_octects));
09456     }
09457 
09458     // This is first, as behaviour of this is completely predictable
09459     if ($input === 'windows-1252' && $output === 'UTF-8')
09460     {
09461       return SimplePie_Misc::windows_1252_to_utf8($data);
09462     }
09463     // This is second, as behaviour of this varies only with PHP version (the middle part of this expression checks the encoding is supported).
09464     elseif (function_exists('mb_convert_encoding') && @mb_convert_encoding("\x80", 'UTF-16BE', $input) !== "\x00\x80" && in_array($input, mb_list_encodings()) && ($return = @mb_convert_encoding($data, $output, $input)))
09465     {
09466       return $return;
09467     }
09468     // This is last, as behaviour of this varies with OS userland and PHP version
09469     elseif (function_exists('iconv') && ($return = @iconv($input, $output, $data)))
09470     {
09471       return $return;
09472     }
09473     // If we can't do anything, just fail
09474     else
09475     {
09476       return false;
09477     }
09478   }
09479 
09491   function encoding($charset)
09492   {
09493     // Normalization from UTS #22
09494     switch (strtolower(preg_replace('/(?:[^a-zA-Z0-9]+|([^0-9])0+)/', '\1', $charset)))
09495     {
09496       case 'adobestandardencoding':
09497       case 'csadobestandardencoding':
09498         return 'Adobe-Standard-Encoding';
09499 
09500       case 'adobesymbolencoding':
09501       case 'cshppsmath':
09502         return 'Adobe-Symbol-Encoding';
09503 
09504       case 'ami1251':
09505       case 'amiga1251':
09506         return 'Amiga-1251';
09507 
09508       case 'ansix31101983':
09509       case 'csat5001983':
09510       case 'csiso99naplps':
09511       case 'isoir99':
09512       case 'naplps':
09513         return 'ANSI_X3.110-1983';
09514 
09515       case 'arabic7':
09516       case 'asmo449':
09517       case 'csiso89asmo449':
09518       case 'iso9036':
09519       case 'isoir89':
09520         return 'ASMO_449';
09521 
09522       case 'big5':
09523       case 'csbig5':
09524         return 'Big5';
09525 
09526       case 'big5hkscs':
09527         return 'Big5-HKSCS';
09528 
09529       case 'bocu1':
09530       case 'csbocu1':
09531         return 'BOCU-1';
09532 
09533       case 'brf':
09534       case 'csbrf':
09535         return 'BRF';
09536 
09537       case 'bs4730':
09538       case 'csiso4unitedkingdom':
09539       case 'gb':
09540       case 'iso646gb':
09541       case 'isoir4':
09542       case 'uk':
09543         return 'BS_4730';
09544 
09545       case 'bsviewdata':
09546       case 'csiso47bsviewdata':
09547       case 'isoir47':
09548         return 'BS_viewdata';
09549 
09550       case 'cesu8':
09551       case 'cscesu8':
09552         return 'CESU-8';
09553 
09554       case 'ca':
09555       case 'csa71':
09556       case 'csaz243419851':
09557       case 'csiso121canadian1':
09558       case 'iso646ca':
09559       case 'isoir121':
09560         return 'CSA_Z243.4-1985-1';
09561 
09562       case 'csa72':
09563       case 'csaz243419852':
09564       case 'csiso122canadian2':
09565       case 'iso646ca2':
09566       case 'isoir122':
09567         return 'CSA_Z243.4-1985-2';
09568 
09569       case 'csaz24341985gr':
09570       case 'csiso123csaz24341985gr':
09571       case 'isoir123':
09572         return 'CSA_Z243.4-1985-gr';
09573 
09574       case 'csiso139csn369103':
09575       case 'csn369103':
09576       case 'isoir139':
09577         return 'CSN_369103';
09578 
09579       case 'csdecmcs':
09580       case 'dec':
09581       case 'decmcs':
09582         return 'DEC-MCS';
09583 
09584       case 'csiso21german':
09585       case 'de':
09586       case 'din66003':
09587       case 'iso646de':
09588       case 'isoir21':
09589         return 'DIN_66003';
09590 
09591       case 'csdkus':
09592       case 'dkus':
09593         return 'dk-us';
09594 
09595       case 'csiso646danish':
09596       case 'dk':
09597       case 'ds2089':
09598       case 'iso646dk':
09599         return 'DS_2089';
09600 
09601       case 'csibmebcdicatde':
09602       case 'ebcdicatde':
09603         return 'EBCDIC-AT-DE';
09604 
09605       case 'csebcdicatdea':
09606       case 'ebcdicatdea':
09607         return 'EBCDIC-AT-DE-A';
09608 
09609       case 'csebcdiccafr':
09610       case 'ebcdiccafr':
09611         return 'EBCDIC-CA-FR';
09612 
09613       case 'csebcdicdkno':
09614       case 'ebcdicdkno':
09615         return 'EBCDIC-DK-NO';
09616 
09617       case 'csebcdicdknoa':
09618       case 'ebcdicdknoa':
09619         return 'EBCDIC-DK-NO-A';
09620 
09621       case 'csebcdices':
09622       case 'ebcdices':
09623         return 'EBCDIC-ES';
09624 
09625       case 'csebcdicesa':
09626       case 'ebcdicesa':
09627         return 'EBCDIC-ES-A';
09628 
09629       case 'csebcdicess':
09630       case 'ebcdicess':
09631         return 'EBCDIC-ES-S';
09632 
09633       case 'csebcdicfise':
09634       case 'ebcdicfise':
09635         return 'EBCDIC-FI-SE';
09636 
09637       case 'csebcdicfisea':
09638       case 'ebcdicfisea':
09639         return 'EBCDIC-FI-SE-A';
09640 
09641       case 'csebcdicfr':
09642       case 'ebcdicfr':
09643         return 'EBCDIC-FR';
09644 
09645       case 'csebcdicit':
09646       case 'ebcdicit':
09647         return 'EBCDIC-IT';
09648 
09649       case 'csebcdicpt':
09650       case 'ebcdicpt':
09651         return 'EBCDIC-PT';
09652 
09653       case 'csebcdicuk':
09654       case 'ebcdicuk':
09655         return 'EBCDIC-UK';
09656 
09657       case 'csebcdicus':
09658       case 'ebcdicus':
09659         return 'EBCDIC-US';
09660 
09661       case 'csiso111ecmacyrillic':
09662       case 'ecmacyrillic':
09663       case 'isoir111':
09664       case 'koi8e':
09665         return 'ECMA-cyrillic';
09666 
09667       case 'csiso17spanish':
09668       case 'es':
09669       case 'iso646es':
09670       case 'isoir17':
09671         return 'ES';
09672 
09673       case 'csiso85spanish2':
09674       case 'es2':
09675       case 'iso646es2':
09676       case 'isoir85':
09677         return 'ES2';
09678 
09679       case 'cseucpkdfmtjapanese':
09680       case 'eucjp':
09681       case 'extendedunixcodepackedformatforjapanese':
09682         return 'EUC-JP';
09683 
09684       case 'cseucfixwidjapanese':
09685       case 'extendedunixcodefixedwidthforjapanese':
09686         return 'Extended_UNIX_Code_Fixed_Width_for_Japanese';
09687 
09688       case 'gb18030':
09689         return 'GB18030';
09690 
09691       case 'chinese':
09692       case 'cp936':
09693       case 'csgb2312':
09694       case 'csiso58gb231280':
09695       case 'gb2312':
09696       case 'gb231280':
09697       case 'gbk':
09698       case 'isoir58':
09699       case 'ms936':
09700       case 'windows936':
09701         return 'GBK';
09702
